firſt ere pitty moue father enclin'd way fer virgin affection gone forth ile make queene naples pro soft one word eythers pow'rs buſines muſt vneaſie make leaſt light winning make prize light one word charge attend do'ſt heere vſurpe name ow'ſt haſt put vpon iſland win lord on't fer man mir ther's nothing ill dwell temple ill-ſpirit haue fayre houſe good things dwell with't pro follow proſ speake beſeech father proſ hence hang garments mira sir haue pity ile proſ silence one word shall make chide hate aduocate impoſtor huſh think'ſt hauing caliban fooliſh wench th' moſt men caliban angels mira affections moſt humble haue ambition goodlier man proſ come obey nerues infancy againe haue vigour fer dreame bound vp fathers loſſe weakneſſe feele wracke friends mans threats light might priſon day behold mayd corners elſe o' th' earth let liberty make vſe enough haue priſon proſ workes come haſt done well fine ariell follow harke elſe mee mira comfort fathers better nature sir appeares vnwonted came proſ free mountaine windes exactly points command ariell th' proſ come follow exeunt actus secundus scoena prima enter alonſo sebaſtian anthonio gonzalo adrian franciſco others gonz beſeech sir merry haue cauſe haue ioy eſcape much beyond loſſe hint woe common euery day saylors wife maſters merchant merchant haue iuſt theame woe miracle meane preſeruation millions like vs wiſely good sir come ile follow stephano exeunt scena tertia enter alonſo sebaſtian anthonio gonzallo adrian franciſco gon by'r lakin goe sir old bones akes here's maze trod indeede fourth rights meanders patience needes muſt reſt al old lord cannot blame attach'd wearineſſe th' dulling sit downe reſt euen put hope keepe longer flatterer droun'd thus finde sea mocks fruſtrate land well let goe ant right glad he's hope doe one repulſe forgoe purpoſe reſolu'd t' effect seb next aduantage take throughly ant let night oppreſs'd trauaile cannot vſe vigilance freſh solemne muſicke proſper top inuiſible enter beleeue iſlands certes theſe people iſland though monſtrous yet note manners gentle kinde humaine generation finde many nay almoſt pro honeſt lord haſt well preſent worſe diuels al cannot much muſe geſture expreſſing although want vſe tongue kinde excellent dumbe diſcourſe pro praiſe departing fr vaniſh'd seb matter haue left viands behinde wee haue wilt pleaſe taſte here▪ ale gon faith sir neede feare wee boyes would beleeue mountayneeres dew-lapt like buls whoſe throats hanging wallets fleſh men whoſe heads breſts finde putter fiue one bring vs good warrant al feede although laſt matter feele beſt paſt brother lord duke stand doe thunder lightning enter ariell like harpey claps wings vpon table quient deuice banquet vaniſhes ar three men deſtiny hath inſtrument lower world in't neuer sea hath caus'd belch vp iſland man doth inhabit men moſt vnfit liue haue made mad euen like valour men hang drowne proper fooles fellowes miniſters fate elements temper'd may well wound loud windes bemockt-at-stabs kill cloſing waters diminiſh one dowle that's plumbe fellow miniſters like-invulnerable could hurt maſſie vplifted remember that's buſineſſe three millaine good proſpero expos'd vnto sea hath requit innocent childe foule deed powres delaying forgetting haue incens'd seas shores yea creatures againſt peace sonne alonſo haue bereft doe pronounce lingring perdition worſe death attend wayes whoſe wraths guard moſt deſolate iſle elſe fals vpon heads nothing hearts-ſorrow cleere life enſuing vaniſhes thunder muſicke enter againe daunce mockes mowes carrying table pro brauely figure harpie haſt perform'd ariell grace deuouring inſtruction haſt nothing bated had'ſt good life obſeruation meaner miniſters kindes haue done high charmes work theſe mine enemies knit vp diſtractions powre theſe fits leaue viſit yong ferdinand droun'd mine lou'd darling gon i' th name holy sir al monſtrous monſtrous thought billowes told windes thunder deepe dreadfull organ-pipe pronounc'd name proſper baſe treſpaſſe therefore sonne i' th' ooze bedded i'le deeper ere plummet lye mudded exit seb one feend time ile fight legions ore ant ile second exeunt gon three deſperate great guilt like poyſon giuen worke great time gins bite doe beſeech ioynts follow hinder extaſie may prouoke ad follow pray exeunt omnes actus quartus scena prima enter proſpero ferdinand miranda pro haue auſterely puniſh'd compenſation makes amends haue giuen third mine owne life liue againe tender hand vexations trials loue haſt teſt afore heauen ratifie rich guift ferdinand doe boaſt finde out-ſtrip praiſe make halt behinde fer doe beleeue againſt oracle pro gueſt thine owne acquiſition worthily purchas'd take daughter do'ſt breake virgin-knot ceremonies may full holy right miniſtred aſperſion heauens let fall make contract grow barraine hate sower-ey'd diſdaine diſcord beſtrew vnion bed weedes loathly hate therefore take heede hymens lamps light fer hope quiet dayes faire iſſue long life loue murkieſt den moſt opportune place worſer genius neuer melt mine honor luſt take away edge dayes celebration thinke phoebus steeds founderd night kept chain'd pro fairely sit talke thine owne ariell induſtrious ariell enter ariell ar would potent maſter pro meaner fellowes laſt worthily performe muſt vſe another tricke goe bring rabble ore giue powre place incite quicke motion muſt beſtow vpon eyes yong couple vanity mine art promiſe expect ar preſently pro twincke ar come goe breathe twice cry one tripping toe mop mowe doe loue maſter pro dearely delicate ariell doe approach till do'ſt heare call ar well conceiue exit pro looke true doe giue dalliance much raigne oathes th' fire ith' blood abſtenious elſe good night vow fer warrant sir white cold virgin snow vpon heart abates ardour liuer pro well come ariell bring corolary rather want spirit appear pertly soft muſick tongue eyes enter iris ir ceres moſt bounteous lady rich leas wheate rye barley fetches oates peaſe turphie-mountaines liue nibling sheepe flat medes thetchd stouer keepe bankes pioned twilled brims aprill heſt betrims make cold nymphes chaſt crownes broome-groues whoſe diſmiſſed batchelor loues laſſe-lorne pole-clipt vineyard sea-marge rockey-hard do'ſt ayre queene o' th skie whoſe watry arch meſſenger bids leaue theſe grace iuno deſcends graſſe-plot place come peacocks flye amaine approach rich ceres entertaine enter ceres cer haile many-coloured meſſenger nere do'ſt diſobey wife iupiter wings vpon flowres diffuſeſt hony drops refreſhing end blew bowe do'ſt crowne boskie acres vnſhrubd downe rich proud earth hath queene summond hither gras'd greene ir contract true loue celebrate donation freely eſtate bles'd louers cer tell heauenly bowe venus sonne do'ſt know doe attend queene plot meanes duskie dis daughter got blind-boyes company haue forſworne ir afraid met deitie cutting clouds towards paphos son doue-drawn thought haue done wanton charme vpon man maide whoſe vowes bed-right paid till hymens torch lighted vaine marſes hot minion returnd againe waſpiſh headed broke arrowes swears play sparrows boy right cer higheſt queene state great iuno comes know gate iu do's garners neuer empty vines cluſtring bunches growing plants wtth goodly burthen bowing spring come fartheſt end harueſt scarcity want ceres bleſſing fer moſt maieſticke viſion harmonious charmingly may bold thinke theſe pro spirits mine art haue confines call'd enact preſent fancies fer let liue euer rare wondred father wiſe makes place paradiſe pro sweet iuno ceres whiſper there's elſe doe huſh wages followeſt maſter maſter wages followes therefore art sheepe sp another proofe make cry baâ pro do'ſt heare gau'ſt letter iulia sp sir loſt-mutton gaue letter lac'd-mutton lac'd-mutton gaue mee loſt-mutton nothing labour pro here's paſture muttons sp ground ouer-charg'd beſt pro nay aſtray beſt pound sp nay sir leſſe pound carrying letter pro miſtake meane pound pinfold sp pound pin fold ouer ouer threefold little carrying letter louer pro sp pro nod-i that's noddy sp miſtooke sir nod aske nod pro together noddy sp haue taken paines together take paines pro haue bearing letter sp well perceiue muſt faine beare pro sir doe beare sp marry sir letter orderly hauing nothing word noddy paines pro beſhrew haue quicke wit sp yet cannot ouer-take purſe pro come come open matter briefe sp open purſe money matter may deliuered pro well sir paines sp truely sir thinke you'll hardly win pro could'ſt perceiue much sp sir could perceiue nothing much ducket deliuering letter hard brought minde feare proue hard telling minde giue token hard pro nothing sp much take pains teſtifie bounty thank haue ceſtern'd requital whereof henceforth carry letters sir i'le commend maſter pro go go gone ship wrack cannot periſh hauing aboarde deſtin'd drier death muſt goe better meſſenger feare iulia would daigne lines receiuing worthleſſe poſt exit scoena secunda enter iulia lucetta iul lucetta madam paſſing vnworthy body cenſure thus louely gentlemen iu protheus reſt lu thus many good thinke beſt iul reaſon lu haue womans reaſon thinke becauſe thinke iul would'ſt haue caſt loue lu thought loue caſt away iul reſt hath neuer mou'd lu yet reſt thinke beſt loues ye iul little loue lu fire that's cloſeſt kept burnes moſt iul doe loue doe loue lu oh loue leaſt let men know loue iul would knew minde lu peruſe paper madam iul iulia lu contents iul say gaue lu sir valentines page think protheus would haue giuen way name receiue pardon fault pray iul modeſty goodly broker dare preſume harbour wanton lines whiſper conſpire againſt youth truſt office great worth officer fit place take paper return'd elſe returne lu plead loue deſerues fee hate iul ye gon lu may ruminate exit iul yet would ore-look'd letter call backe againe pray fault chid knowe maid would force letter view since maides modeſty would haue profferer conſtrue fie fie way-ward fooliſh loue like teſtie babe nurſe preſently humbled kiſſe rod churliſhly chid lucetta hence willingly would haue angerly taught brow frowne inward ioy enforc'd heart pennance call lucetta backe aske remiſſion folly paſt hoe lucetta lu would ladiſhip iul is't neere dinner time lu would might kill meat vpon maid iu is't tooke vp gingerly lu nothing iu didſt lu take paper vp let fall iul paper nothing lu nothing concerning iul let lye thoſe concernes lu madam lye concernes vnleſſe haue falſe interpreter iul loue hath writ rime lu might madam tune giue note ladiſhip iul little toyes may poſſible beſt tune light loue lu heauy light tune iu heauy belike hath burden lu melodious would iu lu cannot reach high iu let's song minion lu keepe tune yet thinkes like tune iu doe lu madam tis iu minion lu nay flat marre concord harſh deſcant wanteth meane fill song iu meane dround vnruly baſe lu indeede bid baſe protheus iu babble henceforth trouble coile proteſtation goe get gone let papers lye would fingring anger lu makes would beſt pleas'd angred another letter iu nay would angred oh hatefull hands teare louing words iniurious waſpes feede hony kill bees yeelde ile kiſſe paper amends looke writ kinde iulia vnkinde iulia reuenge ingratitude throw name againſt bruzing-ſtones trampling contemptuouſly diſdaine writ loue wounded protheus poore wounded name boſome bed shall lodge till wound throughly heal'd thus kiſſe twice thrice protheus written downe calme good winde blow word away till haue found letter letter except mine name whirle-winde beare vnto ragged fearefull hanging rocke throw thence raging sea loe one line name twice writ poore forlorne protheus paſſionate protheus iulia ile teare away yet prettily couples complaining names thus fold one vpon another kiſſe embrace contend doe lu madam dinner ready father iu well let vs goe lu theſe papers lye like tel-tales iu reſpect beſt take vp lu nay taken vp laying downe yet lye catching cold iu haue months minde lu madam may things although iudge winke iu come come wilt pleaſe goe exeunt scoena tertia enter antonio panthino protheus ant tell panthino talke wherewith brother held cloyſter pan nephew protheus sonne ant pan wondred lordſhip would youth home men reputation put forth sonnes preferment warres try fortune diſcouer iſlands farre away vniuerſities theſe exerciſes protheus meet requeſt importune let time home would great impeachment age hauing knowne trauaile youth ant need'ſt much importune whereon month haue bin hamering haue conſider'd well loſſe time cannot perfect man tryed tutord world experience induſtry atchieu'd prima enter duke eſcalus lords duke escalus eſc lord duk gouernment properties vnfold would t' affect diſcourſe since put know owne science exceedes liſts aduice giue remaines worth able let worke nature people cities inſtitutions termes common iuſtice y' pregnant art practiſe hath inriched remember commiſſion would haue warpe call hither bid come vs angelo figure vs thinke beare muſt know haue come know pleaſure duke angelo kinde character life th' obſeruer doth hiſtory fully vnfold belongings thine owne proper waſte vpon vertues heauen doth vs torches doe light themſelues vertues goe forth vs alike spirits finely touch'd fine iſſues nature neuer lends excellence like thrifty goddeſſe determines glory creditour thanks vſe bend one part aduertiſe hold therefore angelo remoue full mortallitie mercie vienna liue tongue heart old eſcalus though firſt queſtion take commiſſion ang good lord let teſt made mettle noble great figure vpon duk euaſion haue leauen'd prepared choice proceeded therefore take honors haſte hence quicke condition prefers leaues vnqueſtion'd matters needfull value write time concernings importune goes vs doe looke know doth befall fare well th' hopefull execution doe leaue commiſſions ang yet giue leaue lord▪ may bring way duk haſte may admit neede mine honor haue doe mine owne inforce qualifie lawes good giue hand ile priuily away loue people doe like eyes though doe well doe relliſh well lowd applauſe aues vehement doe thinke man diſcretion do's affect fare well ang heauens giue purpoſes eſc lead forth bring backe happineſſe exit away life true made put mettle reſtrained meanes make falſe one iſab downe heauen earth ang say poze quickly rather moſt iuſt law tooke brothers life redeeme giue vp body vncleanneſſe hath iſab sir beleeue rather giue body ang talke compel'd stand number accompt iſab ang nay ile warrant againſt thing anſwere voyce recorded law pronounce brothers life might charitie brothers life iſab pleaſe doo't ile take perill charitie ang pleaſ'd doo't perill equall poize charitie iſab beg life heauen let beare granting ile make morne-praier haue added faults mine nothing anſwere ang nay heare purſues mine either ignorant crafty that's good iſab let ignorant nothing good graciouſly know better ang thus wiſdome wiſhes appeare moſt bright doth taxe theſe blacke maſques proclaime en-ſhield beauty ten times louder beauty could diſplaied marke receiued plaine ile groſſe brother dye iſab ang offence appeares accountant law vpon paine iſab true ang admit way life leſſe queſtion siſter finding deſir'd perſon whoſe creadit iudge owne great place could fetch brother manacles all-building-law earthly meane either muſt lay downe treaſures body elſe let would doe iſab much poore brother vnder tearmes haue iſa ignomie ranſome free pardon two houſes lawfull mercie nothing kin fowle redemption ang late make law tirant rather prou'd brother merriment vice iſa oh pardon lord oft fals haue would haue seruile skyie-influences doſt habitation keepſt hourely afflict meerely art deaths foole labourſt flight yet runſt toward art noble th' accommodations bearſt nurſt baſeneſſe thou'rt meanes valiant note mee charge article neither time matter circumſtance good morrow take almoſt day pro obey duke pardon purchas'd pardoner himſelfe hence hath offence quicke celeritie borne high authority vice makes mercie mercie's extended faults loue th' offender friended sir newes pro told lord angelo be-like thinking remiſſe mine office awakens mee vnwonted putting methinks hath vs'd duk pray let's heare letter whatſoeuer may heare contrary let claudio executed foure clocke afternoone bernardine better let mee haue claudios head fiue let duely performed thought depends muſt yet deliuer thus faile doe office anſwere perill sir duke barnardine executed th' afternoone pro bohemian borne nurſt vp bred one priſoner nine yeeres old duke came abſent duke either deliuer'd libertie executed haue heard euer manner pro friends wrought repreeues indeed fact till gouernment lord angelo came vndoubtfull proofe duke apparant pro moſt manifeſt denied himſelfe duke hath borne himſelfe penitently priſon touch'd pro man apprehends death dreadfully drunken careleſſe wreakleſſe feareleſſe what's paſt preſent come inſenſible mortality deſperately mortall duke wants aduice pro wil heare none hath euermore liberty priſon giue leaue eſcape hence hee would drunke many times day many daies entirely drunke haue verie oft awak'd carrie execution warrant hath moued duke anon written brow prouoſt honeſty conſtancie reade truly ancient skill beguiles boldnes cunning lay hazard claudio heere haue warrant execute greater forfeit law angelo hath make vnderſtand manifeſted effect craue foure daies mine order warrant inſtructions may guide let barnardine morning executed head borne angelo pro angelo hath diſcouer fauour duke oh death's great diſguiſer may adde shaue head tie beard deſire giue hand mine brother fitter time lord angelo perceiues he's methinkes quickning eye well angelo euill quits well looke loue wife worth worth finde apt remiſſion yet heere's one place cannot pardon knew foole coward one luxurie aſſe mad man wherein haue deſeru'd extoll thus luc faith lord according trick hang may rather would pleaſe might whipt duke whipt firſt hang'd proclaime prouoſt round citie woman wrong'd lewd fellow haue heard himſelfe there's one begot childe let appeare marry nuptiall finiſh'd let whipt hang'd luc beſeech highneſſe doe marry whore highneſſe euen made duke good plead partiall infringe lawes enmity diſcord late sprung rancorous outrage duke merchants well-dealing countrimen wanting gilders redeeme liues haue rigorous blouds excludes pitty threatning lookes mortall inteſtine iarres twixt countrimen vs hath synodes beene decreed siracuſians admit trafficke aduerſe townes nay borne epheſus siracuſian marts fayres againe siracuſian borne come bay epheſus dies goods confiſcate dukes diſpoſe vnleſſe thouſand markes leuied quit penalty ranſome valued higheſt rate cannot amount vnto hundred markes therefore law art condemn'd die mer yet comfort words done woes end likewiſe euening sonne duk well siracuſian briefe cauſe departedſt natiue home cauſe cam'ſt epheſus mer heauier taske could haue beene impos'd griefes vnſpeakeable yet world may witneſſe end wrought nature vile offence ile vtter giues leaue syracuſa borne wedde vnto woman happy hap beene bad liu'd ioy wealth increaſt proſperous voyages often made epidamium till factors death great care goods randone left drew kinde embracements abſence moneths olde almoſt fainting vnder pleaſing puniſhment women beare made prouiſion following arriued beene long became ioyfull mother two goodly one like could diſtinguiſh'd names howre inne meane woman deliuered burthen male twins alike thoſe parents exceeding poore bought brought vp attend wife meanely prowd two boyes made daily motions home returne vnwilling agreed alas wee came aboord league epidamium alwaies winde-obeying deepe gaue tragicke inſtance harme longer retaine much hope obſcured light heauens grant conuay vnto fearefull mindes doubtfull warrant immediate death though would gladly haue imbrac'd yet inceſſant weepings wife weeping muſt come pitteous playnings prettie babes mourn'd faſhion ignorant feare forſt delayes meanes none sailors boate left ripe vs wife carefull latter borne faſtned vnto maſt men prouide one twins bound whil'ſt beene like heedfull children thus diſpos'd wife fixing eyes care fixt faſtned eyther end maſt floating obedient carried towards corinth thought length gazing vpon earth diſperſt thoſe vapours offended vs benefit wiſhed light waxt calme diſcouered two farre making amaine vs corinth epidarus ere came oh let gather went duk nay forward old man doe breake may pitty though pardon merch oh gods done worthily tearm'd mercileſſe vs ere could meet twice fiue leagues encountred mighty rocke violently borne vp helpefull midſt vniuſt diuorce vs fortune left vs alike delight part poore burdened leſſer waight leſſer woe carried winde three taken vp fiſhermen corinth thought length another vs knowing hap gaue healthfull welcome gueſts would haue reft fiſhers prey backe beene therefore homeward bend courſe thus haue heard bliſſe miſfortunes life prolong'd tell owne miſhaps duke doe fauour dilate full haue befalne till merch yongeſt boy yet eldeſt care eighteene yeeres became inquiſitiue brother importun'd attendant caſe like reft brother retain'd name might beare company queſt whil'ſt laboured loue hazarded loſſe lou'd fiue sommers haue fartheſt greece roming cleane bounds aſia coaſting homeward came epheſus hopeleſſe finde yet loth leaue vnſought place harbours men heere muſt end life happy timelie death could trauells warrant liue duke hapleſſe egeon fates haue markt beare extremitie dire miſhap truſt againſt lawes againſt crowne oath dignity mine eares againſt mermaids enter angelo chaime ang mr antipholus anti that's name ang know well loe here's chaine thought haue tane porpentine chaine vnfiniſh'd made thus long anti ang pleaſe haue officer mar know pentecoſt due haue much importun'd bound perſia want gilders voyage therefore make preſent ile attach officer gold euen iuſt owe growing antipholus inſtant met chaine fiue clocke confederates locking doores day goldſmith get gone buy rope bring home dro buy thouſand pound yeare buy rope exit dromio eph man well holpe vp truſts promiſed preſence chaine neither chaine goldſmith came belike thought loue would laſt long chain'd together therefore came gold sauing merrie humor here's note much chaine weighs vtmoſt charect fineneſſe gold chargefull faſhion doth amount three odde duckets debted gentleman pray preſently diſcharg'd bound sea anti furniſh'd preſent monie beſides haue buſineſſe towne good signior take houſe take chaine bid wife disburſe receit thereof perchance gold bring chaine anti beare leaſt come time enough gold well haue chaine ant haue hope haue elſe may returne without money gold nay come pray giue chaine winde tide gentleman blame haue held heere long anti good lord vſe dalliance excuſe breach promiſe porpentine haue chid bringing like firſt begin brawle mar houre pray diſpatch gold heare importunes chaine ant giue wife fetch mony gold come come know gaue euen either chaine token ant fie run humor breath come where's chaine pray let mar buſineſſe cannot brooke dalliance good whe'r you'l anſwer ile leaue officer ant anſwer anſwer gold monie owe chaine ant owe none till receiue chaine gold know gaue halfe houre ant gaue none wrong mee much gold wrong denying conſider vpon credit mar well officer arreſt army offi charge dukes name obey gold touches reputation either conſent pay attach officer ant conſent pay never arreſt fooliſh fellow dar'ſt gold heere fee arreſt officer would brother caſe apparantly arreſt heare ant obey till giue baile buy deere mettall anſwer gold sir haue law epheſus notorious doubt enter dromio sira bay dro maſter there's barke epidamium till owner comes aboord beares away fraughtage haue conuei'd aboord haue bought oyle balſamum aqua-vitae trim merrie winde blowes faire land nought owner maſter madman peeuiſh epidamium dro hier waftage ant drunken rope told purpoſe end dro ropes end bay barke ant debate matter leiſure teach eares liſt heede adriana villaine hie giue key tell deske that's couer'd o're turkiſh tapiſtrie purſe duckets let tell arreſted baile hie gone officer priſon till come exeunt dromio adriana din'd dowſabell claime husband bigge hope compaſſe thither muſt although againſt muſt maſters mindes fulfill exit enter adriana luciana adr ah luciana tempt might'ſt perceiue auſteerely eie plead earneſt yea look'd red pale merrily obſeruation mad'ſt caſe oh hearts meteors tilting face luc firſt deni'de right adr meant none luc heere adr true though yet forſworne hee luc pleaded adr luc loue begg'd begg'd adr perſwaſion tempt loue luc words honeſt might moue firſt praiſe beautie adr did'ſt faire luc haue patience beſeech adr cannot hold tongue though heart deformed crooked old ill-fac'd worſe bodied euery vicious vngentle fooliſh blunt vnkinde stigmaticall making worſe minde luc would iealous one euill loſt wail'd gone adr ah thinke better yet would herein others eies worſe farre neſt lapwing cries away heart praies though tongue doe curſe enter dromio dro goe deske purſe make haſte luc haſt loſt breath dro running faſt adr maſter dromio well dro he's tartar limbo worſe hell diuell euerlaſting garment hath whoſe hard heart button'd vp feind fairie pittileſſe ruffe wolfe nay worſe fellow buffe▪ back friend one countermāds paſſages allies creekes narrow lands hound runs counter yet draws drifoot well one iudgmēt carries poore hel adr man matter dro doe know matter hee reſted caſe adr arreſted tell whoſe dro know whoſe areſted well buffe reſted tell miſtris redemption monie deske adr go fetch siſter wonder exit luciana thus vnknowne debt tell areſted band dro band thing chaine chaine doe ring adria chaine dro bell time gone two ere comfort iniurie exit enter antipholus siracuſia there's man meete doth well acquainted friend euerie one doth call name tender monie inuite giue thankes kindneſſes offer commodities buy euen a' tailor cal'd silkes bought therewithall tooke meaſure body sure theſe imaginarie wiles lapland sorcerers inhabite enter dromio sir dro maſter here's gold haue got picture old adam new apparel'd ant gold adam do'ſt meane dro adam kept paradiſe adam keepes priſon hee goes calues-skin kil'd prodigall hee came behinde like euill angel bid forſake libertie ant vnderſtand dro plaine caſe went like baſe-viole caſe leather man gentlemen tired giues reſts takes pittie decaied men giues durance vp reſt doe exploits mace moris pike ant mean'ſt officer dro serieant band brings man anſwer breakes band one thinkes man alwaies going bed god giue good reſt ant well reſt foolerie puts forth night may gone dro brought word houre barke expedition put forth night hindred serieant tarry hoy delay angels deliuer ant fellow diſtract wander illuſions bleſſed power deliuer vs hence enter curtizan cur well met well met maſter antipholous haue found gold-ſmith chaine promis'd day ant sathan auoide charge tempt dro maſter miſtris sathan ant diuell dro nay worſe diuels dam comes habit light wench thereof comes wenches god dam that's much god make light wench written▪ appeare men like angels light light effect fire fire burne ergo light wenches burne come neere cur man maruailous merrie goe wee'll mend dinner dro maſter expect beſpeake long ant dromio dro marrie muſt haue long muſt eate diuell ant auoid fiend tel'ſt art coniure leaue gon cur giue ring mine dinner diamond chaine promis'd ile gone trouble dro diuels aske parings ones naile ruſh haire drop blood pin nut cherrieſtone couetous wold haue chaine maſter wiſe giue diuell chaine fright vs cur pray ring elſe chaine hope meane cheate ant auant witch come dromio let vs go dro flie pride pea-cocke miſtris know exit cur doubt antipholus mad elſe would neuer demeane himſelfe ring hath mine worth fortie duckets promis'd chaine one denies reaſon gather mad beſides preſent inſtance rage mad tale told day dinner owne doores againſt entrance belike wife acquainted fits purpoſe doores againſt way way hie home houſe tell wife lunaticke ruſh'd houſe tooke perforce ring away courſe fitteſt chooſe fortie duckets much looſe enter ant heard denie forſweare mar theſe eares mine knowſt hear fie wretch pitty liu'ſt walke honeſt men reſort ant art villaine impeach thus ile proue mine honor mine honeſtie againſt preſently dar'ſt mar poſſeſſion held man adr weeke hath beene heauie much different man till afternoone paſſion ne're brake extremity rage ab hath loſt much wealth wrack buried deere friend hath elſe eye stray'd affection home lock'd duke chaine gold lord ran heere theſe people chaine necke mar beſides theſe eares mine heard confeſſe chaine firſt forſwore mart thereupon drew fled abbey heere whence thinke come miracle keepe way gods name haue done beat alwaies end iades tricke know old pedro leonato claudio benedicke deere friend leonato hath inuited tell leaſt moneth heartily praies occaſion may detaine vs longer dare hee hypocrite praies heart leon lord forſworne let mee bid welcome lord reconciled prince brother owe duetie iohn thanke many words thanke leon pleaſe grace leade pedro hand leonato goe together clau pray iudgement bene yfaith thinks low hie praiſe browne faire praiſe little great praiſe onely commendation affoord vnhandſome doe like clau think'ſt pray tell truely lik'ſt bene would buie enquier clau world buie iewell ben yea caſe put brow doe play flowting iacke tell vs cupid good hare-finder vulcan rare carpenter come key man take goe clau mine eie ladie euer lookt bene yet without matter there's coſin poſſeſt furie exceedes much beautie firſt maie doth laſt december hope haue intent turne husband haue clau would truſt though contrarie hero would wife bene iſt come faith hath world one man weare cap neuer batcheller three againe goe yfaith wilt needes thruſt necke yoke weare print away looke pedro returned enter pedro iohn baſtard pedr hath held followed leonatoes bened would grace would conſtraine mee tell pedro charge allegeance ben heare count claudio dumbe man would haue thinke allegiance marke allegiance hee loue graces part marke anſwere hero leonatoes daughter clau vttred bened like old tale lord indeede god forbid clau paſſion change god forbid otherwiſe pedro amen loue ladie verie well worthie clau fetch lord pedr troth thought clau faith lord mine bened two faiths troths lord mine clau loue feele pedr worthie know bened neither feele loued know worthie opinion fire cannot melt die pedr waſt euer obſtinate heretique deſpight beautie clau neuer could maintaine part force ben woman conceiued thanke brought mee vp likewiſe giue moſt humble thankes haue echare winded forehead hang bugle inuiſible baldricke women pardon becauſe wrong miſtruſt doe right truſt none fine may goe finer liue batchellor pedro ere die looke pale loue bene anger hunger lord loue proue euer looſe blood loue get againe drinking picke mine eyes ballet-makers penne hang man turn'd orthography words fantaſticall banquet iuſt many diſhes may conuerted theſe eyes cannot tell thinke bee loue may transforme oyſter ile take oath till haue made oyſter neuer make foole one impoſſible may weare heart firſt prin well heare daughter let coole loue benedicke well could wiſh would modeſtly examine himſelfe much vnworthy haue good lady leon lord walke dinner ready clau doat doth come trace alley vp downe talke muſt onely benedicke doe name let part praiſe euer man merit talke muſt benedicke loue beatrice matter little cupids craſty arrow made onely wounds heare-ſay begin enter beatrice looke beatrice like lapwing runs cloſe ground heare conference vrſ pleaſant'ſt angling fiſh cut golden ores greedily deuoure treacherous baite angle beatrice euen couched wood-bine couerture feare part dialogue go neare eare looſe nothing falſe baite lay truely vrſula diſdainfull know coy wilde haggerds rocke benedicke loues beatrice intirely prince new trothed lord vrſ bid tell madam intreate acquaint perſwaded lou'd benedicke wiſh wraſtle affection neuer let beatrice know vrſula doth gentleman deſerue full fortunate bed euer beatrice couch vpon hero god loue know doth deſerue much may yeelded man nature neuer fram'd womans heart prowder beatrice diſdaine scorne ride eyes miſ-prizing looke wit values highly matter elſe weake cannot loue take proiect affection shee indeared vrſula sure thinke therefore certainely good knew loue left make hero truth neuer yet man wiſe noble yong rarely featur'd would backward faire fac'd would gentleman blacke nature drawing anticke made foule blot tall launce ill headed low agot vildlie cut vane blowne windes blocke moued none turnes euery man wrong neuer giues truth vertue merit purchaſeth vrſu sure carping commendable hero odde faſhions beatrice cannot commendable dare tell would mocke ayre would laugh preſſe death wit therefore let benedicke like couered fire conſume away waſte inwardly better death die mockes bad die tickling yet tell heare hero rather goe benedicke counſaile fight againſt paſſion truly ile deuiſe honeſt coſin one doth know much ill word may impoiſon liking doe doe coſin wrong cannot much without true iudgement hauing excellent wit priſde haue refuſe rare gentleman benedicke hero onely man italy alwaies excepted deare claudio vrſu pray angry madame speaking fancy signior benedicke bearing argument valour goes formoſt report italy hero indeed hath excellent good name excellence earne ere married madame hero euerie day morrow come goe ile attires haue counſell beſt furniſh morrow vrſu shee's tane warrant haue caught madame hero proue louing goes haps cupid kills arrowes traps exit beat fire mine eares true stand condemn'd pride much contempt farewell maiden pride adew glory liues behinde backe benedicke loue requite taming wilde heart louing hand doſt loue kindeneſſe incite binde loues vp holy band others doſt deſerue beleeue better reportingly exit enter prince claudio benedicke leonato prince doe till marriage conſummate go toward arragon clau ile bring thither lord you'l vouchſafe prin nay would great new gloſſe marriage childe new coat forbid weare onely bee bold benedicke companie crowne head foot mirth hath twice thrice cut cupids bow-ſtring little hang-man dare hath heart bell tongue clapper heart thinkes tongue bene gallants haue bin leo methinkes claud hope loue prin hang truant there's true drop bloud truly toucht loue wants money bene haue tooth-ach prin draw bene hang claud muſt hang firſt draw afterwards prin tooth-ach leon humour worme bene well euery one cannot maſter griefe hee clau yet loue prin appearance fancie vnleſſe fancy hath diſguiſes bee dutchman day frenchman morrow vnleſſe hee haue fancy foolery appeares hee hath hee foole fancy would haue appeare clau loue vvith vvoman beleeuing old bruſhes hat mornings bode prin hath man barbers clau barbers man hath beene olde ornament cheeke hath alreadie tennis balls leon indeed lookes yonger hee loſſe beard prin nay rubs himſelfe vvith ciuit clau that's much youth's loue prin greateſt note melancholy clau vvhen vvas vvont vvaſh face prin yea paint himſelfe heare vvhat clau gentleman nay hath tongues beleeue hee thing munday night forſwore tueſday morning there's double tongue there's two tongues thus howre together tranſ-ſhape particular vertues yet laſt concluded waſt propreſt man italie claud wept heartily car'd prin yea yet hate deadlie would loue dearely old mans daughter told vs clau moreouer god vvhen hid garden prin bulls hornes benedicks head clau yea text brother baſtard fled meſſina haue among kill'd innocent ladie lord lackebeard meete till peace prin earneſt clau moſt profound earneſt ile warrant loue beatrice prin hath challeng'd clau moſt prin ballance nay curſing hypocrite muſt lookt prin two brothers men bound borachio one clau harken offence lord▪ prin officers offence haue theſe men done conſt marrie haue committed falſe report moreouer inde firſt opening gorgeous eaſt bowes vaſſall head blinde kiſſes baſe ground obedient breaſt peremptory eagle-ſighted eye dares looke vpon heauen brow blinded maieſtie kin zeale furie hath inſpir'd loue night heere weedes athens doth weare maſter deſpiſed athenian maide heere maiden danke durty ground pretty durſt lye neere lacke-loue kill-curteſie churle vpon eyes throw power charme doth owe wak'ſt let loue forbid sleepe eye-lid awake gone muſt oberon exit enter demetrius helena running hel stay though kill demetrius de charge hence haunt thus hel wilt darkling leaue de stay perill alone goe exit demetrius hel breath fond chace prayer leſſer grace happy hermia whereſoere lies hath bleſſed attractiue eyes came eyes bright teares eyes oftner waſht vgly beare beaſts meete runne away feare therefore maruaile though demetrius doe monſter flie preſence thus wicked diſſembling glaſſe mine made compare hermias eyne lyſander ground deade aſleepe bloud wound lyſander liue good awake lyſ melted seems remembrance idle gaude childehood doat vpon faith vertue heart obiect pleaſure mine eye onely helena lord betroth'd ere hermia like loath food health come naturall taſte doe wiſh loue long euermore true theſ faire louers fortunately met diſcourſe heare anon egeus ouer-beare temple vs theſe couples eternally knit morning worne purpos'd hunting aſide away vs athens three three wee'll hold feaſt great come hippolitae exit duke lords dem theſe things vndiſtinguiſhable like farre mountaines turned clouds me-thinks theſe things parted eye euery things double hel me-thinkes haue found demetrius like iewell mine owne mine owne dem mee yet dreame thinke duke heere bid vs follow yea father hel hippolitae lyſ bid vs follow temple dem awake lets follow way let vs recount dreames bottome wakes exit louers clo cue comes call anſwer next moſt faire piramus hey ho peter quince flute bellowes-mender snout tinker starueling gods life stolne hence left aſleepe haue moſt rare viſion dreame paſt wit man dreame man aſſe goe expound dreame me-thought man tell me-thought me-thought man patch'd foole offer me-thought eye man hath heard eare man hath mans hand able taſte tongue conceiue heart quin haue bottomes houſe come home yet staru cannot heard doubt hee tranſported thiſ come play mar'd goes forward doth quin poſſible haue man athens able diſcharge piramus thiſ hee hath beſt wit wilfull youth owe loſt pleaſe another arrow way firſt doubt watch ayme finde bring latter hazard backe againe thankfully reſt debter firſt know well herein time winde loue circumſtance doubt doe wrong euen vttermoſt furniſh belmont faire portia goe preſently enquire money queſtion make haue truſt exeunt enter portia waiting woman neriſſa portia troth nerriſſa little body wearie great world ner would madam miſeries abundance good fortunes yet ought much nothing happineſſe therefore bee meane comes white haires competencie liues longer portia good well pronounc'd ner would better well according deſcription leuell affection ner firſt neopolitane prince por that's colt indeede doth nothing talke horſe hee makes great appropriation owne good parts himſelfe much afraid ladie mother plaid falſe smyth ner countie palentine por doth nothing frowne haue chooſe heares merrie tales feare hee proue weeping phyloſopher growes old full vnmannerly youth rather married deaths head bone three thouſand ducats tuball wealthy hebrew tribe furniſh many months doe deſire reſt faire good worſhip laſt man mouthes ant shylocke albeit neither lend borrow taking giuing exceſſe yet ripe wants friend ile breake cuſtome yet poſſeſt much would shy three thouſand ducats ant three months shy forgot three months told well bond let heare thoughts neither lend borrow vpon aduantage ant doe neuer vſe shy iacob graz'd vncle labans iacob holy abram wife mother wrought behalfe third poſſeſſer third ant take interreſt shy take intereſt would directly intereſt marke iacob laban himſelfe compremyz'd canelings pied fall iacobs hier ewes rancke end autumne turned rammes worke generation betweene theſe woolly breeders act skilfull pil'd certaine wands dooing deede kinde vp fulſome ewes conceauing eaning time fall party-colour'd lambs thoſe iacobs way thriue bleſt thrift bleſſing men ant venture iacob thing power bring paſſe faſhion'd hand heauen inſerted make interreſt good gold ewes rams shy cannot tell make breede faſt note ant marke baſſanio diuell cite scripture purpoſe euill producing holy witneſſe like villaine cheeke goodly apple rotten heart goodly outſide falſehood hath shy three thouſand ducats good round three months twelue let rate ant well shylocke beholding shy signior anthonio many time oft ryalto haue rated monies vſances still haue borne patient badge tribe call misbeleeuer cut-throate dog vpon iewiſh gaberdine vſe mine owne well appeares neede helpe goe come shylocke would haue moneyes voide rume vpon beard foote curre ouer threſhold moneyes hath dog money poſſible curre lend three thouſand ducats shall bend low bond-mans key bated breath whiſpring humbleneſſe say faire wedneſday laſt day another time cald dog theſe curteſies ile lend thus much moneyes ant like call againe againe wilt lend money lend friends friendſhip take breede barraine mettall friend lend rather thine enemie breake maiſt better face exact penalties shy looke would friends haue loue forget haue supplie preſent wants take doite vſance moneyes youle heare kinde offer baſſ kindneſſe shy kindneſſe goe notarie bond merrie repaie day place expreſt condition let forfeite nominated equall pound faire fleſh cut taken part bodie pleaſeth ant content infaith ile bond much kindneſſe iew baſſ bond ile rather dwell neceſſitie ant feare man forfaite it▪ within theſe two months that's month bond expires doe expect returne thrice three times valew bond shy father abram theſe chriſtians whoſe owne hard dealings teaches thoughts others praie tell breake daie gaine exaction forfeiture pound mans fleſh taken man eſtimable profitable neither fleſh muttons beefes goates buy fauour extend friendſhip take adiew loue praie wrong ant yes shylocke vnto bond shy meete forthwith notaries giue direction merrie bond goe purſe ducats see houſe left fearefull gard vnthriftie knaue preſentlie ile exit ant hie gentle iew hebrew turne chriſtian growes kinde baſſ like faire teames villaines minde ant come diſmaie shippes come home month daie exeunt actus secundus enter morochus tawnie moore white three foure followers accordingly portia nerriſſa traine flo cornets mor miſlike complexion liuerie burniſht neighbour neere bred bring faireſt creature north-ward borne phoebus fire thawes yſicles let vs make ineiſion loue proue whoſe blood reddeſt mine tell ladie aſpect mine hath feard valiant loue beſt regarded virgins clyme haue lou'd would change hue except thoughts gentle queene por tearmes choiſe led nice direction maidens eies beſides lottrie deſtenie bare right voluntarie chooſing father hedg'd wit yeelde wife wins meanes told renowned prince faire commer haue look'd yet affection mor euen thanke therefore pray lead caskets trie fortune sy tas sophie perſian prince won louing kiſſe baſſ gentle faire lady leaue come note giue receiue like one two contending prize thinks hath done well peoples eies hearing applauſe vniuerſall giddie gazing doubt whether thoſe peales praiſe thrice faire lady euen doubtfull whether true vntill confirm'd ratified por lord baſſiano though alone would ambitious wiſh wiſh much better yet would trebled twenty times thouſand times faire ten thouſand times rich onely high account might vertues beauties liuings friends exceed account full nothing terme groſſe vnleſſoned girle vnſchool'd vnpractiz'd happy yet old may learne happier shee bred dull learne happieſt gentle commits directed lord gouernour king mine conuerted lord faire manſion maſter queene ore euen houſe theſe lord giue ring part looſe giue away let preſage ruine loue vantage exclaime baſſ maddam haue bereft words onely bloud vaines confuſion powers oration fairely beloued prince doth appeare among buzzing pleaſed multitude euery blent together turnes wilde nothing ioy expreſt expreſt ring parts finger parts life hence bold baſſanio's dead ner lord lady time haue wiſhes proſper cry good ioy good ioy lord lady gra lord baſſanio gentle lady wiſh ioy wiſh wiſh none honours meane bargaine faith doe beſeech euen time may married baſſ heart canſt get wife gra thanke lordſhip gaue got one eyes lord looke miſtres beheld maid lou'd lou'd intermiſſion pertaines lord fortune vpon caskets mine matter falls wooing heere vntill fwet againe till rough dry oathes loue laſt promiſe laſt got promiſe faire one heere haue loue prouided fortune atchieu'd miſtreſſe por true nerriſſa ner madam pleas'd withall baſſ doe gratiano meane good faith gra yes faith lord baſſ feaſt much honored marriage gra weele play firſt boy thouſand ducats ner downe gra nere win downe comes heere lorenzo infidell old venetian friend salerio enter lorenzo ieſſica salerio baſ lorenzo salerio welcome hether youth new intereſt heere haue power bid welcome leaue bid verie friends countrimen sweet portia welcome por lord intirely welcome lor thanke honor part lord purpoſe haue heere meeting salerio way intreate mee paſt nay come along sal lord haue reaſon signior anthonio commends baſſ ere ope letter pray tell good friend doth sal lord vnleſſe minde wel vnleſſe minde letter wil eſtate opens letter gra nerriſſa cheere yond bid welcom hand salerio what's newes venice doth royal merchant good anthonio know vvil glad iaſons haue won fleece sal would vvon fleece hee hath loſt por contents yond paper colour baſſianos cheeke deere friend dead elſe nothing world could turne much conſtitution conſtant man worſe worſe leaue baſſanio halfe muſt freely haue halfe thing paper brings baſſ portia heere vnpleaſant'ſt words euer blotted paper gentle ladie firſt impart loue freely told wealth ran vaines gentleman told true yet deere ladie rating nothing much braggart told nothing haue told vvas worſe nothing indeede haue ingag'd deere friend ingag'd friend meere enemie feede meanes heere letter ladie paper bodie friend euerie word gaping wound iſſuing life blood true salerio hath ventures faild one hit tripolis mexico england lisbon barbary india one veſſell dreadfull touch merchant-marring rocks sal one lord beſides appeare preſent money diſcharge iew would take neuer know creature beare man keene greedy confound man plyes duke morning night doth impeach freedome deny iuſtice twenty merchants duke himſelfe magnificoes greateſt port haue perſwaded none driue enuious plea forfeiture iuſtice bond ieſſi haue heard tuball chus countri-men would rather haue anthonio's fleſh twenty times value owe know lord law authoritie power denie goe hard poore anthonio por deere friend thus trouble baſſ deereſt friend kindeſt man beſt condition'd vnwearied curteſies one ancient romane honour appeares drawes breath italie por owes iew baſſ three thouſand ducats por pay thouſand deface bond double thouſand treble friend deſcription shall loſe haire baſſano's fault firſt goe church call wife away venice friend neuer lie portias vnquiet haue gold pay petty debt twenty times ouer payd bring true friend along maid nerriſſa meane time liue maids widdowes come away hence vpon wedding day bid friends welcome merry cheere since deere bought loue deere let heare letter friend sweet baſſanio haue miſcarried creditors grow cruell eſtate low bond iew forfeit paying impoſſible liue debts cleerd betweene might death notwithſtanding vſe pleaſure loue doe perſwade come let letter por loue diſpach buſines gone baſſ since haue good leaue goe away make haſt till come againe bed ere guilty reſt interpoſ twixt vs twaine exeunt enter iew solanio anthonio iaylor iew iaylor looke tell mercy foole lends money gratis iaylor looke ant heare yet good shylok iew ile haue bond againſt bond haue oath haue bond call'dſt dog hadſt cauſe dog beware phangs duke grant iuſtice wonder naughty iaylor art fond come abroad requeſt ant pray heare iew ile haue bond heare ile haue bond therefore ile made dull ey'd foole head relent yeeld chriſtian interceſſors follow ile haue haue bond exit iew sol moſt impenetrable curre euer kept men ant let alone ile follow bootleſſe prayers life reaſon well know oft deliuer'd forfeitures many haue times made mone therefore hates sol duke neuer grant forfeiture hold duke cannot deny courſe law commoditie haue vs venice denied much impeach iuſtice state since trade profit citty conſiſteth nations therefore goe theſe greefes loſſes haue bated mee hardly pound fleſh morrow bloudy creditor well iaylor pray god baſſanio come pay debt care exeunt enter portia nerriſſa lorenzo ieſſica man portias lor madam although preſence haue noble true conceit god-like amity appeares moſt bearing thus abſence lord knew honour true gentleman releefe deere louer lord husband know would prouder worke cuſtomary bounty enforce por neuer repent good companions conuerſe waſte time together whoſe doe beare egal yoke loue muſt needs like proportion lyniaments manners makes thinke anthonio boſome louer lord muſt needs like lord little coſt haue beſtowed purchaſing helliſh cruelty comes neere praiſing therefore heere things lorenſo commit hands husbandry mannage houſe vntill lords returne mine owne part haue toward heauen breath'd vow liue prayer contemplation onely attended nerriſſa heere vntill husband lords returne monaſtery miles oft abide doe deſire denie impoſition loue neceſſity layes vpon lorenſ madame heart obey faire commands por people doe already know minde acknowledge ieſſica place lord baſſanio far well till meete againe lor faire thoughts happy houres attend ieſſi wiſh ladiſhip hearts content por thanke wiſh well pleas'd wiſh backe faryouwell ieſſica exeunt balthaſer haue euer found honeſt true let finde take letter vſe indeauor man mantua render coſins hand doctor belari looke notes garments doth giue bring pray imagin'd vnto tranect common ferrie trades venice waſte time words get gone balth madam goe conuenient por come neriſſa haue worke hand yet know wee'll husbands thinke vs nerriſſa shall vs portia nerriſſa habit thinke accompliſhed lacke ile hold wager accoutered like yong men ile proue prettier fellow two weare dagger brauer grace betweene change man boy reede voyce turne two minſing manly frayes like fine bragging youth tell quaint lyes honourable ladies loue denying fell died could doe withall ile repent wiſh kil'd twentie theſe punie lies ile tell men haue diſcontinued aboue twelue moneth haue within minde thouſand raw tricks theſe bragging iacks practiſe nerriſ wee turne men portia fie queſtions wert nere lewd interpreter come ile tell whole deuice coach vs parke gate therefore haſte away muſt meaſure twentie miles day exeunt enter clowne ieſſica clown yes truly looke father laid vpon children therefore promiſe feare alwaies plaine agitation matter therfore good cheere truly thinke damn'd one hope doe anie good kinde baſtard hope neither ieſſica hope pray clow marrie may partlie hope father got iewes daughter ieſ kinde baſtard hope indeed mother viſited vpon clow truly feare damned father mother thus scilla father fall charibdis mother well gone waies ieſ husband hath made chriſtian clow truly blame chriſtians enow ne many could wel liue one another making chriſtians raiſe price hogs wee grow porke-eaters wee haue raſher coales money enter lorenzo ieſ ile tell husband lancelet heere comes loren grow iealous lancelet thus get wife corners ieſ nay need feare vs lorenzo launcelet tells flatly mercy mee heauen becauſe iewes daughter hee good member common wealth conuerting iewes chriſtians raiſe price porke loren anſwere better commonwealth getting vp negroes bellie moore childe launcelet clow much moore reaſon leſſe honeſt woman indeed tooke loren euerie foole play vpon word thinke beſt grace witte turne diſcourſe grow commendable none onely parrats goe bid prepare dinner clow done haue loren goodly lord witte-ſnapper bid prepare dinner clow done onely couer word loren couer clow neither know dutie loren yet quarrellng occaſion wilt whole wealth wit inſtant pray vnderſtand plaine man plaine meaning goe fellowes bid couer table meat come dinner clow table meat bee couered comming dinner let humors conceits gouerne exit clowne lor deare diſcretion words foole hath planted memory armie good words doe know many fooles better place garniſht like trickſie word defie matter cheer'ſt ieſſica good opinion doſt like lord baſſiano's wife ieſſi paſt expreſſing meete lord baſſanio liue vpright life hauing bleſſing lady findes ioyes heauen heere earth earth doe meane reaſon neuer come heauen two gods play heauenly match wager lay two earthly women portia one muſt elſe paund poore rude world hath fellow loren euen husband haſt wife ieſ nay aske opinion lor anone firſt let vs goe dinner ieſ nay let praiſe haue lor pray let table talke ere things digeſt ieſſi well ile forth exeunt actus quartus enter duke magnificoes anthonio baſſanio gratiano duke anthonio heere ant ready pleaſe grace duke art come anſwere aduerſary inhumane wretch vncapable pitty voyd empty dram mercie ant haue heard grace hath tane great paines qualifie rigorous courſe obdurate lawful meanes carrie enuies reach oppoſe patience fury arm'd quietneſſe tiranny rage du go one cal iew court sal ready doore comes lord enter shylocke du make roome let face shylocke world thinkes thinke leadeſt faſhion mallice laſt houre act thought thou'lt mercy remorſe apparant cruelty exact'ſt penalty pound poore merchants fleſh wilt onely looſe forfeiture touch'd humane gentleneſſe loue forgiue moytie principall glancing eye pitty loſſes haue late hudled backe enow preſſe royall merchant downe plucke commiſeration braſſie boſomes rough hearts flints turkes tarters neuer traind offices tender curteſie expect gentle anſwer iew iew haue poſſeſt grace purpoſe holy sabbath haue haue due forfeit bond denie let danger light vpon charter cities freedome you'l aske rather chooſe haue weight carrion fleſh receiue three thouſand ducats ile anſwer humor anſwered houſe troubled rat pleas'd giue ten thouſand ducates haue bain'd anſwer'd yet men loue gaping pigge mad behold cat others bag-pipe i' th noſe cannot containe vrine affection maſters paſſion moode likes loaths anſwer firme reaſon rendred cannot abide gaping pigge harmleſſe neceſſarie cat woollen bag-pipe force muſt yeeld ineuitable offend himſelfe offended giue reaſon lodg'd hate certaine loathing beare anthonio follow thus looſing againſt anſwered baſſ anſwer vnfeeling man excuſe currant cruelty iew bound pleaſe anſwer baſſ men kil things loue iew hates man thing would kill baſſ euerie offence hate firſt iew wouldſt haue serpent twice ant pray thinke queſtion iew may well go vpon beach bid maine flood baite vſuall height euen well vſe queſtion wolfe ewe bleate lambe may well forbid mountaine pines wagge high tops make noiſe fretted guſts heauen may well thing moſt hard harder iewiſh heart therefore beſeech make offers vſe farther meanes briefe plaine conueniencie let haue iudgement iew baſ three thouſand ducates heereis iew euerie ducat thouſand ducates parts euery part ducate would draw would haue bond du hope mercie rendring none iew iudgement dread wrong haue among many purchaſt like aſſes dogs mules vſe abiect parts becauſe bought shall let free marrie heires vnder burthens let beds made let pallats viands anſwer anſwer pound fleſh demand deerely bought mine haue deny fie vpon law force decrees venice iudgement anſwer shall haue du vpon power may diſmiſſe court vnleſſe bellario learned doctor haue determine come heere day sal lord heere without meſſenger letters doctor new come padua du bring vs letters call meſſengers baſſ good cheere anthonio man corage yet iew haue fleſh blood bones ere looſe one drop blood ant tainted weather flocke meeteſt death weakeſt kinde fruite drops earlieſt ground let cannot better employ'd baſſanio liue write mine epitaph enter nerriſſa du came padua bellario ner lord bellario greets grace baſ doſt whet knife earneſtly iew cut forfeiture bankrout gra harſh iew mak'ſt knife keene mettall hangmans axe beare halfe keenneſſe enuy prayers pierce iew none haſt wit enough make gra damn'd inexecrable dogge life let iuſtice accus'd almoſt mak'ſt wauer faith hold opinion pythagoras animals infuſe themſelues trunkes men curriſh gouern'd wolfe hang'd humane euen gallowes fell fleet whil'ſt layeſt vnhallowed dam infus'd deſires woluiſh bloody rauenous iew till canſt raile bond offend'ſt lungs loud repaire wit good youth fall endleſſe ruine heere law du letter bellario doth commend yong learned doctor court ner attendeth heere hard know anſwer whether you'l admit du heart three four go giue curteous conduct shylocke forth por name shylocke iew shylocke name por nature follow yet rule venetian law cannot impugne proceed within danger ant por confeſſe bond ant por muſt iew mercifull iew compulſion muſt tell por quality mercy droppeth gentle raine heauen vpon place beneath twice bleſt bleſſeth giues takes mightieſt mightieſt becomes throned monarch better crowne scepter force temporall power attribute awe maieſtie wherein doth dread feare kings mercy aboue enthroned hearts kings attribute god himſelfe earthly power doth likeſt gods mercie iuſtice therefore iew though iuſtice plea conſider courſe iuſtice none vs pray mercie prayer doth teach vs render deeds mercie haue thus much mittigate iuſtice plea follow courſe venice muſt needes giue merchant shy deeds vpon head craue law penaltie forfeite bond por able diſcharge money baſ yes heere tender court yea twice bound pay ten times ore forfeit hands head heart muſt appeare malice beares downe truth beſeech wreſt law authority great right little wrong curbe cruell diuell por muſt power venice alter decree eſtabliſhed recorded preſident many error example ruſh cannot iew daniel come iudgement yea daniel wiſe young iudge honour por pray let looke vpon bond iew heere moſt reuerend doctor heere por shylocke there's thrice monie offered shy oath oath haue oath heauen shall lay periurie vpon venice por bond forfeit lawfully iew may claime pound fleſh cut neereſt merchants heart mercifull take thrice money bid teare bond iew paid according tenure doth appeare worthy iudge know law expoſition hath beene moſt charge law whereof well-deſeruing pillar proceede iudgement power tongue man alter heere bond moſt heartily beſeech court giue iudgement por thus muſt prepare boſome knife iew noble iudge excellent yong man por intent purpoſe law hath full relation penaltie heere appeareth due vpon bond iew verie true wiſe vpright iudge much elder art lookes por therefore lay bare boſome iew breſt bond doth noble iudge neereſt heart thoſe words por ballance heere weigh fleſh iew haue ready por haue surgeon shylock charge wounds leaſt bleede death iew nominated bond por expreſt good much charitie iew cannot finde bond por come merchant haue thing ant little arm'd well prepar'd giue hand baſſanio fare well greeue falne heerein fortune kinde cuſtome vſe let wretched man out-liue wealth view hollow eye wrinkled brow age pouerty lingring penance miſerie doth cut commend honourable wife tell proceſſe anthonio's end say lou'd faire death tale told bid iudge whether baſſanio loue repent looſe friend repents payes debt iew cut deepe enough ile pay inſtantly heart baſ anthonio married wife deere life life wife world eſteem'd aboue life would looſe heere deuill deliuer por wife would giue little thanks heare make offer gra haue wife proteſt loue would heauen could intreat power change curriſh iew ner well offer behinde backe wiſh would make elſe vnquiet houſe iew theſe chriſtian husbands haue daughter would barrabas beene husband rather chriſtian trifle time pray purſue por pound marchants fleſh thine court awards law doth giue iew moſt rightfull iudge por muſt cut fleſh breaſt law allowes court awards iew moſt learned iudge come prepare por tarry little elſe bond doth giue heere iot bloud words expreſly pound fleſh take bond take pound fleſh cutting doſt one drop chriſtian bloud lands goods lawes venice confiſcate vnto venice gra vpright iudge marke iew learned iudge shy law por act vrgeſt iuſtice aſſur'd haue iuſtice deſireſt gra learned iudge mark iew learned iudge iew take offer pay bond thrice let chriſtian goe baſſ heere money por soft iew haue iuſtice haſte haue nothing penalty gra iew vpright iudge learned iudge por therefore prepare cut fleſh shed bloud cut leſſe iuſt pound fleſh tak'ſt leſſe iuſt pound much makes light heauy deuiſion twentieth part one poore nay doe turne eſtimation hayre dieſt goods confiſcate gra daniel daniel iew infidell haue hip por doth iew pauſe take forfeiture shy giue principall let goe baſſ haue ready heere por hath refus'd open court haue meerly iuſtice bond gra daniel daniel thanke iew teaching word shy shall haue barely principall por haue nothihg forfeiture taken perill iew shy deuill giue good ile longer queſtion por tarry iew law hath yet another hold enacted lawes venice proued againſt alien direct indirect attempts life citizen party gainſt doth contriue shall one halfe goods halfe comes priuie coffer state offenders life lies mercy duke onely gainſt voice predicament appeares manifeſt proceeding indirectly directly haſt contriu'd againſt life defendant haſt incur'd danger formerly rehearſt downe therefore beg mercy duke gra beg maiſt haue leaue hang yet wealth forfeit haſt left value cord therefore muſt hang'd charge duk difference pardon life aske halfe wealth anthonio's halfe comes generall humbleneſſe may driue vnto fine por anthonio shy nay take life pardon take houſe take prop doth houſe take life doe take meanes whereby liue por mercy render anthonio gra halter gratis nothing elſe gods ant pleaſe lord duke court quit fine one halfe goods content let haue halfe vſe render vpon death vnto gentleman lately daughter two things prouided fauour preſently become chriſtian doe record gift heere court dies poſſeſt vnto lorenzo daughter duk doe elſe doe recant pardon late pronounced heere por art contented iew doſt shy content por clarke draw deed gift shy pray giue leaue goe hence well deed duke get gone doe gra chriſtning haue two godfathers iudge haue ten bring gallowes font exit du sir intreat home dinner por humbly doe deſire grace pardon muſt away night toward padua meere preſently forth duk leyſure anthonio gratifie gentlemen minde much bound exit duke traine baſſ moſt worthy gentlemen friend haue wiſedome beene day acquitted greeuous penalties lie whereof three thouſand ducats due vnto iew freely cope curteous paines withall indebted ouer aboue loue euermore por well paid well deliuering therein doe account well paid minde neuer yet mercinarie pray know meete againe wiſh well take leaue baſſ deare force muſt attempt take remembrance vs tribute fee grant two things pray denie pardon por preſſe mee farre therefore yeeld giue gloues ile weare loue ile take ring doe draw backe hand ile take loue deny baſſ ring good alas trifle giue por wil haue nothing elſe onely methinkes haue minde baſ there's depends valew deareſt ring venice giue finde proclamation onely pray pardon por liberall offers taught firſt beg thinkes teach beggar anſwer'd baſ good ring giuen wife put made vow neither giue loſe por many men gifts wife mad woman know well haue deſeru'd ring shee would hold enemy euer giuing well peace exeunt ant baſſanio let haue ring let deſeruings loue withall valued againſt wiues commandement baſſ goe gratiano run ouer-take giue ring bring canſt vnto anthonios houſe away make haſte exit grati come thither preſently morning early flie toward belmont come anthonio exeunt enter portia nerriſſa por enquire iewes houſe giue deed let wee'll away night day husbands home deed well welcome lorenzo enter gratiano gra faire well ore-tane baſſanio vpon aduice hath heere ring doth intreat company dinner por cannot ring doe accept moſt thankfully pray tell furthermore pray youth old shylockes houſe gra doe ner sir would ile get husbands ring make keepe euer por maiſt warrant haue old giue rings away men weele out-face out-ſweare away make haſte know'ſt tarry ner come good houſe exeunt actus quintus enter lorenzo ieſſica lor moone bright night winde gently kiſſe trees make nuyſe night troylus thinkes mounted troian walls toward grecian tents creſſed lay night ieſ night thisbie fearefully ore-trip dewe lyons ere himſelfe ranne diſmayed away loren night stood dido willow hand vpon wilde bankes waft loue come againe carthage ieſ night medea gathered inchanted hearbs renew old eſon loren night ieſſica wealthy iewe vnthrift loue runne venice farre belmont ieſ night young lorenzo lou'd well stealing many vowes faith nere true one loren night pretty ieſſica like little slander loue forgaue ieſſi would out-night body come harke heare footing man enter meſſenger lor comes faſt night meſ friend loren friend friend name pray friend meſ stephano name bring word miſtreſſe breake day heere belmont doth holy croſſes kneeles prayes happy wedlocke houres loren comes meſ none holy hermit maid pray maſter yet rnturn'd loren haue heard goe pray ieſſica ceremoniouſly let vs vs prepare welcome miſtreſſe houſe enter clowne clo sola wo ha ho loren calls clo sola lorenzo lorenzo lor leaue hollowing man heere clo sola lor heere clo tel ther's poſt come maſter horne full good newes maſter ere morning loren let's expect comming yet matter goe friend stephen pray within houſe miſtreſſe hand bring muſique foorth ayre moone-light vpon banke heere let muſicke creepe eares night become tutches harmonie sit ieſſica looke floore heauen thicke inlayed pattens bright gold there's beholdſt motion like angell still quiring young eyed cherubins harmonie immortall whilſt muddy veſture decay doth groſly cloſe cannot heare come hoe wake diana hymne tutches pearce miſtreſſe eare draw home muſicke ieſſi neuer merry heare muſique play muſicke lor reaſon attentiue doe note wilde wanton heard race youthful vnhandled colts fetching mad bounds bellowing neighing loud hot condition bloud heare perchance trumpet ayre muſicke touch eares perceiue make mutuall eyes turn'd modeſt gaze power muſicke therefore poet faine orpheus drew trees floods since naught hard full rage muſicke time doth change nature man hath muſicke himſelfe moued concord fit treaſons motions dull night affections darke erobus let man truſted marke muſicke enter portia nerriſſa por light burning hall farre little candell throwes beames good deed naughty world ner moone candle por doth greater glory dim leſſe brightly king vntill king empties doth inland brooke maine waters muſique harke muſicke ner muſicke madame houſe por nothing good without reſpect methinkes much day ner silence beſtowes vertue madam por crow doth larke neither attended thinke nightingale day euery gooſe cackling would thought better muſitian wren many things right praiſe true perfection peace moone endimion would awak'd muſicke ceaſes lor voice much deceiu'd portia por knowes blinde man knowes cuckow bad voice lor deere lady welcome home por haue bene praying husbands welfare hope better words return'd lor madam yet come meſſenger comming por go nerriſſa giue order take note abſent bound por much bound heare much bound anth wel acquitted por sir verie welcome houſe muſt appear waies words therefore breathing curteſie gra yonder moone wrong faith gaue iudges clearke would gelt part since take loue much hart por quarrel hoe alreadie what's matter gra hoope gold paltry ring giue whoſe poeſie world like cutlers poetry vpon knife loue mee leaue mee ner talke poeſie valew giue would weare til houre death lye graue though yet vehement oaths haue beene reſpectiue haue kept gaue iudges clearke wel know clearke wil nere weare haire on's face gra wil liue man nerriſſa woman liue man gra hand gaue youth kinde boy little boy higher iudges clearke prating boy begg'd fee could heart deny por blame muſt plaine part wiues firſt gift thing oathes vpon finger riueted faith vnto fleſh gaue loue ring made neuer part heere dare would leaue plucke finger wealth world maſters faith gratiano giue wife vnkinde cauſe greefe mad baſſ beſt cut left hand loſt ring defending gre lord baſſanio gaue ring away vnto iudge beg'd indeede deſeru'd boy clearke tooke paines writing begg'd mine neyther man maſter would take ought two rings por ring gaue lord hope receiu'd baſſ could adde lie vnto fault would deny finger hath ring vpon gone por euen voide falſe heart truth heauen wil nere come bed vntil ring ner til againe mine baſſ sweet portia know gaue ring know gaue ring would conceiue gaue ring vnwillingly left ring nought would accepted ring would abate diſpleaſure por knowne vertue ring halfe worthineſſe gaue ring owne honour containe ring would haue parted ring man much vnreaſonable pleas'd haue defended termes zeale wanted modeſtie vrge thing held ceremonie nerriſſa teaches beleeue ile die for't woman ring baſſ mine honor madam woman ciuill doctor refuſe three thouſand ducates beg'd ring denie go diſpleas'd away euen held vp verie life deere friend lady inforc'd beſet curteſie honor would let ingratitude much beſmeare pardon good lady theſe bleſſed candles night bene thinke would haue beg'd ring giue worthie doctor por let doctor ere come neere houſe since hath got iewell loued keepe become liberall ile deny thing haue body husbands bed know well lie night home watch like argos doe left alone mine honour yet mine owne ile haue doctor bedfellow nerriſſa clarke therefore well aduis'd doe leaue mine owne protection gra well doe let take doe ile mar yong clarks pen ant th' vnhappy theſe quarrels por sir grieue welcome notwithſtanding baſ portia forgiue enforced wrong hearing theſe manie friends euen thine owne faire eyes wherein por marke eyes doubly himſelfe eye one double there's oath credit baſ nay heare pardon fault neuer breake oath anth lend bodie wealth husbands ring quite miſcarried dare bound againe vpon forfeit lord neuer breake faith aduiſedlie por giue bid keepe better ant heere lord baſſanio keep ring baſſ heauen gaue doctor por pardon baſſanio ring doctor lay ner pardon gentle gratiano boy doctors clarke liew laſt night lye gra like mending high waies sommer waies faire enough cuckolds ere haue deſeru'd por speake groſſely amaz'd heere letter reade leyſure comes padua bellario finde portia doctor nerriſſa clarke lorenzo heere shall witneſſe forth eu'n return'd haue yet entred houſe anthonio welcome haue better newes expect vnſeale letter finde three argoſies richly come harbour dainlie know accident chanced letter antho dumbe baſſ doctor knew gra clark make cuckold ner clark neuer meanes doe vnleſſe liue vntill man baſſ sweet doctor bedfellow abſent wife sweet ladie haue giuen life liuing heere reade certaine come rode por lorenzo clarke hath good comforts ner ile giue without fee doe giue ieſſica rich iewe deed gift death dies poſſeſſ'd loren faire ladies drop manna way people por almoſt morning yet theſe euents full let vs goe charge vs vpon intergatories anſwer things faithfully gra let firſt intergatory nerriſſa whether till next night rather goe bed two houres day day come wiſh darke till couching doctors clarke well liue ile feare thing keeping nerriſſas ring exeunt finis like actus primus scoena prima enter orlando adam orlando remember adam vpon faſhion bequeathed poore thouſand crownes charged brother bleſſing breed mee well begins brother iaques keepes report goldenly profit part keepes ruſtically home properly heere home vnkept call keeping gentleman birth differs oxe horſes bred hee lets mee feede hindes barres mee place brother much lies mines gentility education adam grieues father thinke within mee begins mutinie againſt longer endure though yet know wiſe remedy auoid enter oliuer adam yonder comes maſter brother orlan goe a-part adam heare vp oli sir make heere orl nothing taught make thing oli mar orl marry helping mar god made poore vnworthy brother idleneſſe oliuer marry better employed naught orlan shall keepe hogs eat huskes prodigall portion haue come penury oli know orl well heere orchard oli know orl better knowes mee know eldeſt brother gentle condition bloud know courteſie nations allowes better firſt borne tradition takes away bloud twenty brothers betwixt vs haue much father mee albeit confeſſe comming neerer reuerence oli boy orl come come elder brother yong oli wilt lay hands villaine orl villaine yongeſt sir rowland de boys father thrice villaine father begot villaines wert brother would take hand throat till puld tongue haſt qualities father growes mee longer endure therefore allow exerciſes may become gentleman giue mee poore allottery father left teſtament goe buy fortunes oli wilt beg well get long troubled haue part pray leaue orl offend becomes mee good oli get olde dogge adam old dogge reward moſt true haue loſt teeth god olde maſter would haue word ex orl ad oli euen begin grow vpon phyſicke ranckeneſſe yet giue thouſand crownes neyther holla dennis enter dennis den calls worſhip oli charles dukes wraſtler heere den pleaſe heere doore importunes acceſſe oli call good way morrow wraſtling enter charles cha good morrow worſhip oli good mounſier charles what's new newes new court charles there's newes court sir olde newes old duke baniſhed yonger brother new duke three foure louing lords haue put themſelues voluntary exile whoſe lands reuenues enrich new duke therefore giues good leaue wander oli tell roſalind dukes daughter bee baniſhed father cha dukes daughter coſen loues euer cradles bred together hee would haue followed exile haue died behind court leſſe beloued vncle owne daughter neuer two ladies loued doe oli old duke liue cha hee already forreſt arden many merry men liue like old robin hood england many yong gentlemen flocke euery day fleet time careleſly golden world oli wraſtle morrow new duke cha marry doe came acquaint matter giuen vnderſtand yonger brother orlando hath diſpoſition come diſguis'd againſt mee try fall morrow wraſtle credit hee eſcapes without broken limbe acquit well brother young tender loue would bee loth foyle muſt owne honour hee come therefore loue came hither acquaint withall either might intendment brooke diſgrace well runne thing owne altogether againſt oli charles thanke loue finde moſt kindly require notice brothers purpoſe heerein haue vnder-hand meanes laboured diſſwade reſolute ile tell charles yong fellow france full ambition enuious emulator euery mans good parts villanous contriuer againſt mee naturall brother therefore vſe diſcretion lieſe didſt breake necke finger wert beſt looke to't doſt diſgrace hee doe mightilie grace himſelfe hee practiſe againſt poyſon entrap treacherous deuiſe neuer leaue till hath tane life indirect meanes aſſure almoſt teares one young villanous day liuing brotherly anathomize hee muſt bluſh weepe muſt looke pale wonder cha heartily glad came hither hee come morrow ile giue payment euer comes old man three cel could match beginning old tale le beu three proper yong men excellent growth preſence roſ bils neckes knowne vnto men theſe preſents le beu eldeſt three wraſtled charles dukes beu clo thus men may grow wiſer euery day firſt time euer heard breaking ribbes ladies cel promiſe roſ elſe longs broken muſicke yet another doates vpon rib-breaking shall wraſtling coſin le beu muſt liege yongeſt sir roland de boys duk would hadſt beene man elſe world eſteem'd father honourable finde mine enemie haue better pleas'd deede hadſt deſcended another houſe fare well art gallant youth talke good earneſt poſſible fall liking old sir roulands yongeſt roſ duke father lou'd father deerelie cel doth therefore enſue loue sonne deerelie kinde chaſe hate father hated father deerely yet hate orlando roſ faith hate cel doth deſerue well enter duke lords roſ let loue loue becauſe doe looke comes duke cel eies full anger duk miſtris diſpatch haſte get court roſ vncle duk coſen within deere vncle neuer much thought vnborne offend highneſſe duk thus doe traitors purgation conſiſt words innocent grace let truſt roſ yet miſtruſt cannot make traitor tell whereon likelihoods depends duk art fathers daughter there's enough roſ highnes took dukdome highneſſe baniſht treaſon inherited lord deriue friends what's father traitor good leige miſtake much thinke pouertie treacherous cel deere
