iunos swans still went coupled inſeperable duk verie per patience speake people pittie art foole robs name wilt bright vertuous gone open lips firme irreuocable doombe haue paſt vpon baniſh'd cel pronounce leige cannot liue companie duk foole neice prouide out-ſtay time vpon mine honor greatneſſe word die exit duke cel poore roſaline whether wilt goe wilt change fathers giue mine charge grieu'd roſ haue cauſe cel haſt coſen prethee cheerefull know'ſt duke hath baniſh'd daughter roſ hath cel hath roſaline lacks loue teacheth one shall part girle let father another heire therefore deuiſe may flie whether goe beare vs doe take change vpon beare griefes leaue heauen pale say canſt ile goe along roſ whether goe cel vncle forreſt arden roſ alas danger vs maides trauell forth farre beautie prouoketh theeues gold cel ile put poore meane attire kinde vmber face like doe paſſe along neuer aſſailants roſ better becauſe common tall points like man gallant curtelax vpon thigh bore-ſpeare hand heart lye hidden womans feare weele haue marſhall outſide manie manniſh cowards haue doe outface cel call art man roſ ile haue worſe name ioues owne page therefore looke call ganimed call'd cel something hath reference longer celia aliena roſ coſen aſſaid clowniſh foole fathers court would comfort trauaile cel heele goe along ore wide world leaue alone woe let's away get iewels wealth together deuiſe fitteſt time way hide vs purſuite made flight goe content libertie baniſhment exeunt actus secundus scoena prima enter duke senior amyens two three lords like forreſters duk sen coe-mates brothers exile hath old cuſtome made life painted pompe theſe woods free perill enuious court heere feele penaltie adam difference cie phange churliſh chiding winters winde bites blowes vpon body euen till cold flattery theſe counſellors feelingly perſwade sweet vſes aduerſitie like toad ougly venemous weares yet precious iewell head life exempt publike haunt findes tongues trees bookes running brookes sermons good euery thing amien would change happy grace tranſlate fortune quiet du sen come goe kill vs veniſon yet irkes poore dapled fooles natiue burgers deſert city owne confines forked heads haue round banches goard lord indeed lord melancholy iaques grieues kinde doe vſurpe doth brother hath baniſh'd day lord amiens behinde lay along vnder oake whoſe anticke roote peepes vpon brooke brawles along wood place poore stag hunters aime tane hurt come languiſh indeed lord wretched annimall heau'd forth groanes diſcharge leatherne coat almoſt burſting big round teares cours'd one another downe innocent noſe pitteous chaſe thus hairie foole much marked melancholie iaques stood th' extremeſt verge brooke augmenting teares du sen iaques moralize lord yes thouſand firſt weeping needleſſe poore deere quoth mak'ſt teſtament worldlings doe giuing muſt alone left abandoned veluet friend right quoth thus miſerie doth part fluxe companie anon careleſſe heard full paſture iumps along neuer greet quoth iaques sweepe fat greazie citizens iuſt faſhion wherefore doe looke vpon poore broken bankrupt thus moſt inuectiuely pierceth body countrie citie court yea life meere vſurpers tyrants whats worſe fright annimals kill vp aſſign'd natiue dwelling place sen leaue contemplation lord lord weeping commenting vpon deere du sen show place loue cope theſe fits he's full matter lor ile bring exeunt scena secunda enter duke lords duk poſſible man cannot villaines court conſent lo cannot heare ladies attendants chamber saw bed morning early found bed vntreaſur'd miſtris lor lord royniſh clown oft grace wont laugh alſo miſſing hiſperia princeſſe gentlewoman confeſſes ore-heard daughter coſen much commend parts graces wraſtler lately foile charles beleeues euer gone youth companie duk send brother fetch gallant hither abſent bring brother ile make finde let inquiſition quaile bring againe theſe fooliſh runawaies exunt scena tertia enter orlando adam orl who's ad yong maſter oh gentle maſter oh maſter memorie old sir rowland make vertuous people loue wherefore gentle valiant would fond ouercome bonnie priſer humorous duke praiſe come home know maſter kinde men graces enemies doe vertues gentle maſter holy traitors oh world comely enuenoms beares what's matter ad vnhappie youth come within theſe doores within roofe enemie graces liues brother brother yet yet call call father hath heard praiſes night meanes burne lodging vſe lye within faile haue meanes cut ouerheard practiſes place houſe butcherie abhorre feare doe enter ad whether adam would'ſt haue go ad matter whether come orl would'ſt haue go beg food baſe boiſtrous sword enforce theeuiſh liuing common rode muſt know yet rather malice diuerted blood bloudie brother ad haue fiue hundred crownes thriftie hire vnder father foſter nurſe old limbs lie lame vnregarded age corners throwne take doth rauens feede yea prouidently caters sparrow comfort age gold giue let though looke old yet luſtie youth neuer apply hot rebellious liquors bloud vnbaſhfull forehead woe meanes weakneſſe debilitie therefore age luſtie winter froſtie kindely let goe ile doe yonger man buſineſſe neceſſities orl oh good old man well appeares conſtant antique world dutie meede art faſhion theſe times none promotion hauing choake vp euen hauing poore old man prun'ſt rotten tree cannot much bloſſome yeelde lieu paines husbandrie come waies weele goe along together ere haue youthfull wages weele light vpon low content ad maſter goe follow laſt gaſpe truth loyaltie yeeres till almoſt foureſcore liued liue yeeres many fortunes foureſcore late weeke yet fortune cannot recompence better die well maſters debter exeunt scena quarta enter roſaline ganimod celia aliena clowne alias touchſtone roſ iupiter merry clo care legges wearie roſ could finde heart diſgrace mans apparell cry like woman muſt comfort weaker veſſell doublet hoſe ought coragious petty-coate therefore courage good aliena cel pray beare cannot goe clo part rather beare beare yet beare croſſe beare thinke haue money purſe roſ well forreſt arden clo arden foole home better place trauellers muſt content enter miſtreſſe maſter haue oft enquired shepheard complain'd loue turph praiſing proud diſdainfull shepherdeſſe miſtreſſe cel well cor pageant truely plaid betweene pale complexion true loue red glowe prowd diſdaine goe hence little conduct marke roſ come let vs remoue louers feedeth thoſe loue bring vs ile proue buſie actor play exeunt scena quinta enter siluius phebe sil sweet phebe doe phebe say loue bitterneſſe common executioner whoſe heart th' accuſtom'd death makes hard falls axe vpon humbled neck firſt begs pardon dies liues bloody drops enter roſalind celia corin phe would executioner flye would iniure tellſt murder mine eye pretty probable eyes frailſt things coward gates atomyes called tyrants butchers murtherers doe frowne heart mine eyes wound let kill counterfeit fall downe canſt oh lye mine eyes murtherers wound mine eye hath made scratch pin remaines leane vpon ruſh cicatrice capable impreſſure palme moment keepes mine eyes haue darted hurt force eyes doe hurt sil deere phebe euer euer may neere meet freſh cheeke power fancie know wounds inuiſible loues keene arrows make phe till time come neere time comes afflict mockes pitty till time pitty roſ pray might mother inſult exult ouer wretched though hau beauty faith without candle may goe darke bed muſt therefore prowd pittileſſe meanes looke ordinary natures little life thinke meanes tangle eies faith proud miſtreſſe hope inkie browes blacke haire bugle eye-balls cheeke creame entame worſhip fooliſh shepheard wherefore follow like foggy south puffing winde raine thouſand times properer man woman fooles makes world full ill-fauourd children glaſſe flatters proper lineaments miſtris know downe knees thanke heauen faſting good mans loue muſt tell friendly eare sell markets cry man mercy loue take offer foule moſt foule foule take shepheard fare well phe sweet youth pray chide yere together rather chide man wooe roſ hee falne loue foulneſſe fall loue anger faſt anſweres frowning lookes ile bitter words looke vpon phe ill beare roſ pray fall loue mee falſer vowes made wine beſides like know houſe tufft oliues hard goe siſter shepheard ply hard come siſter shepheardeſſe looke better proud though world could none could abus'd hee come flocke exit phe dead shepheard might euer lov'd lou'd firſt sil sweet phebe phe hah siluius sil sweet phebe pitty phe gentle siluius sil euer reliefe would doe griefe loue giuing loue griefe extermin'd phe haſt loue neighbourly sil would haue phe couetouſneſſe siluius time hated yet beare loue canſt talke loue well company erſt irkeſome endure ile employ doe looke recompence thine owne gladneſſe art employd sil holy perfect loue pouerty grace thinke moſt plenteous crop gleane broken eares man maine harueſt reapes looſe ile liue vpon phe knowſt youth mee yere-while sil well haue met oft hath bought cottage bounds old carlot maſter phe thinke loue though ask peeuiſh boy yet talkes well care words yet words well pleaſes thoſe heare pretty youth prettie hee's proud yet pride becomes hee'll make proper man beſt thing complexion faſter tongue make offence eye heale vp tall yet yeeres hee's tall leg yet well pretty redneſſe lip little riper luſtie red mixt cheeke iuſt difference betwixt conſtant red mingled damaske women siluius markt parcells would haue gone neere fall loue part loue hate yet haue cauſe hate loue doe chide mine eyes black haire blacke remembred maruell anſwer'd againe that's one omittance quittance ile write tanting letter beare wilt siluius sil phebe heart phe ile write matter's head heart bitter paſſing goe siluius exeunt actus quartus scena prima enter roſalind celia iaques iaq prethee pretty youth let better acquainted roſ melancholly fellow iaq doe loue better laughing roſ thoſe extremity either abhominable fellowes betray themſelues euery moderne cenſure worſe drunkards iaq good nothing roſ good poſte iaq haue neither schollers melancholy emulation muſitians fantaſticall courtiers proud souldiers ambitious lawiers politick ladies nice louers theſe melancholy mine owne compounded many extracted many obiects indeed contemplation trauells often rumination wraps moſt humorous roſ traueller faith haue great reaſon feare haue owne lands mens haue much haue nothing haue rich eyes poore hands iaq yes haue gain'd experience enter orlando roſ experience makes rather haue foole make merrie experience make trauaile orl good day happineſſe deere roſalind iaq nay god buy talke blanke verſe roſ farewell mounſieur trauellor looke liſpe weare diſable benefits owne countrie loue natiuitie almoſt chide god making countenance thinke haue gundello orlando haue bin louer another tricke neuer come orl faire roſalind come within houre promiſe roſ breake houres promiſe loue hee diuide minute thouſand parts breake part thouſand part minute affairs loue may cupid hath clapt oth' ile warrant heart hole orl pardon deere roſalind roſ nay tardie come liefe woo'd snaile orl snaile roſ snaile though comes hee carries houſe head better ioyncture thinke make woman beſides brings deſtinie orl what's roſ hornes wr faine beholding wiues comes armed fortune preuents wife orl vertue horne-maker roſalind vertuous roſ roſalind cel pleaſes call hath roſalind better leere roſ come wooe wooe mee holy-day humor like enough conſent would verie verie roſalind orl would kiſſe roſ nay poore world almoſt thouſand yeeres old time anie man died owne perſon videlicet loue cauſe trotlous braines daſh'd grecian club yet hee could die one patternes loue leander would haue liu'd manie faire yeere though hero turn'd nun bin hot midſomer-night good youth went forth waſh helleſpont taken crampe droun'd fooliſh chronoclers age found hero ceſtos theſe lies men haue died time time wormes haue eaten loue orl would haue right roſalind mind proteſt frowne might kill roſ hand kill flie come roſalind comming-on diſpoſition aske grant orl loue roſalind roſ yes faith fridaies orl wilt haue roſ twentie orl roſ good orl hope roſalind one deſire much good thing come prieſt marrie vs giue hand orlando doe orl pray marrie vs cel cannot words roſ muſt begin orlando cel goe wil orlando haue wife roſalind orl roſ orl faſt marrie vs roſ muſt take roſalind wife orl take roſalind wife roſ might aske commiſſion doe take orlando husband there's girle goes prieſt certainely womans thought runs actions orl thoughts wing'd roſ tell long would haue haue poſſeſt orl euer day roſ say day without euer orlando men aprill woe december wed maides may maides sky changes wiues bee iealous barbary cocke-pidgeon ouer hen clamorous parrat againſt raine new-fangled ape giddy deſires monkey weepe nothing like diana fountaine wil diſpos'd merry laugh like hyen art inclin'd orl roſalind doe roſ life doe doe orl wiſe ros elſe could haue wit doe wiſer waywarder make doores vpon womans wit caſement key-hole flie chimney orl man wife wit might wit whether wil't roſ nay might keepe checke till met wiues wit going neighbours bed orl wit could wit haue excuſe roſa marry came neuer take without anſwer vnleſſe take without tongue woman cannot make fault huſbands occaſion let neuer nurſe childe breed like foole orl theſe two houres roſalinde wil leaue roſ alas deere loue cannot lacke two houres orl muſt attend duke dinner two clock againe roſ goe waies goe waies knew would proue friends told mee much thought leſſe flattering tongue wonne one caſt away come death two o'clocke howre orl roſalind roſ troth good earneſt god mend mee pretty oathes dangerous breake one iot promiſe come one oft contriue kill oli doe tell conuerſion taſtes thing roſ bloody napkin oli firſt laſt betwixt vs two teares recountments moſt kindely bath'd came deſert place briefe led gentle duke gaue freſh aray welcome motley-minded gentleman haue often met forreſt hath bin courtier clo man doubt let put mee purgation haue trod meaſure haue flattred lady haue bin politicke friend mine enemie haue vndone three tailors haue foure quarrels like haue fought one iaq tane vp clo met found quarrel vpon cauſe iaq cauſe good lord like fellow du se like well clo god ild deſire like preſſe heere amongſt reſt country copulatiues forſweare according mariage binds blood breakes poore virgin il-fauor'd thing mine owne poore humour mine take man elſe rich honeſtie dwels like miſer poore houſe pearle foule oyſter du se faith clo according fooles bolt dulcet diſeaſes iaq cauſe finde quarrell cauſe clo vpon lye times remoued beare bodie audry thus diſlike cut certaine courtiers beard word beard cut well hee minde call'd retort courteous word againe well cut wold word cut pleaſe himſelfe call'd quip modeſt againe well cut diſabled iudgment called reply churliſh againe well cut would anſwer true call'd reproofe valiant againe well cut wold lie call'd counter-checke quarrelſome lye circumſtantiall lye direct iaq oft beard well cut clo durſt go lye circumſtantial durſt giue lye direct wee meaſur'd rare fellow lord he's good thing yet foole du se vſes folly like vnder preſentation wit enter hymen roſalind celia still muſicke hymen mirth heauen earthly things made eauen attone together good duke receiue daughter hymen heauen brought yea brought hether mightſt ioyne hand whoſe heart within boſome roſ giue giue du se truth daughter orl truth roſalind phe true loue adieu roſ ile haue father ile haue husband ne're wed woman hy peace hoa barre confuſion muſt make concluſion theſe moſt euents here's eight muſt take hands ioyne hymens bands truth holds true contents croſſe part hart hart loue reſtor'd againe exil'd true engage life du se welcome yong man offer'ſt fairely brothers wedding one lands with-held land large potent dukedome firſt forreſt let vs thoſe ends heere vvete well begun wel begot euery happie number haue endur'd daies nights vs shal good returned fortune according meaſure meane time forget new-falne dignitie fall ruſticke reuelrie play muſicke brides bride-groomes meaſure heap'd ioy to' th meaſures fall iaq sir patience heard rightly duke hath put religious life throwne neglect pompous court bro hath iaq theſe conuertites much matter heard learn'd former honor bequeath patience vertue well deſerues loue true faith doth merit land loue great allies long well-deſerued bed wrangling louing voyage two moneths victuall'd pleaſures dancing meazures du se stay iaques iaq paſtime would haue ile know abandon'd caue exit du se proceed proceed wee'l begin theſe rights truſt they'l end true delights exit roſ faſhion ladie epilogue vnhandſome lord prologue true good wine needs buſh true good play needes epilogue yet good wine vſe good buſhes good playes proue better helpe good epilogues caſe neither good epilogue cannot inſinuate behalfe good play furniſh'd like begger therefore begge become mee way coniure ile begin women charge women loue beare men like much play pleaſe charge men loue beare women perceiue none hates betweene women play may pleaſe woman would kiſſe many beards pleas'd complexions lik'd breaths defi'de many haue good beards good faces breaths kind offer make curt'ſie bid farewell exit finis taming shrew actus primus scoena prima enter begger hoſtes chriſtophero sly begger ile pheeze faith hoſt paire rogue beg y' baggage slies rogues looke chronicles came richard conqueror therefore paucas pallabris let world seſſa hoſt pay glaſſes haue burſt beg deniere go ieronimie goe cold bed warme hoſt know remedie muſt go fetch head-borough beg third fourth fift borough ile anſwere law ile budge inch boy let come kindly falles aſleepe winde hornes enter lord hunting traine lo hunt man charge tender wel hounds brach meriman poore curre imboſt couple clowder deepe-mouth'd brach saw'ſt boy siluer made good hedge corner couldeſt fault would looſe dogge twentie pound huntſ belman good lord cried vpon meereſt loſſe twice day pick'd dulleſt truſt take better dogge lord art foole eccho fleete would eſteeme worth dozen well looke vnto morrow intend hunt againe huntſ lord lord what's heere one dead drunke see doth breath hun breath's lord warm'd ale bed cold lord oh monſtrous beaſt like lyes grim death foule loathſome thine image sirs practiſe drunken man thinke conuey'd bed wrap'd cloathes rings put vpon fingers moſt delicious banquet bed braue attendants neere wakes would begger forget himſelfe hun beleeue lord thinke cannot chooſe would vnto k'd lord euen flatt'ring dreame worthles fanc take vp manage well ieſt carrie gently faireſt chamber hang round vvanton pictures balme foule head warme diſtilled waters burne wood make lodging procure muſicke readie vvakes make dulcet heauenly chance readie lowe reuerence say honor vvil command let one attend vvith baſon full roſe-water beſtrew'd flowers another beare ewer third diaper wilt pleaſe lordſhip oole hands one readie coſtly aske apparrel weare another tell hounds horſe ladie mournes diſeaſe perſwade hath bin lunaticke dreames nothing mightie lord kindly gentle wil paſtime paſſing excellent husbanded modeſtie huntſ lord warrant wil play part thinke true diligence leſſe lord take vp gently bed one office wakes sound trumpets thanke honor lord intend night player pleaſe lordſhippe accept dutie lord heart fellow remember since plaide farmers eldeſt woo'd gentlewoman well haue forgot name part aptly fitted naturally perform'd sincklo thinke soto honor meanes lord verie true didſt excellent well come happie time rather haue hand wherein cunning aſſiſt much lord heare play night doubtfull modeſties leaſt ouer-cying odde behauiour yet honor neuer heard play breake merrie paſſion offend tell growes impatient flai feare lord contain verieſt anticke world lord go take butterie giue friendly welcome euerie one let want nothing houſe affoords exit one players sirra go bartholmew page dreſt like ladie done conduct drunkards chamber call madam obeiſance tell win loue beare himſelfe honourable action hath obſeru'd noble ladies vnto lords accompliſhed dutie drunkard let lowe tongue lowly curteſie is't honor command wherein ladie humble wife may dutie make knowne loue kinde embracements tempting kiſſes declining head boſome bid teares ouer-ioyed noble lord reſtor'd health yeares hath eſteemed better poore loathſome begger boy haue womans guift raine commanded teares onion wil well napkin cloſe conuei'd shall deſpight enforce waterie eie see diſpatch'd haſt canſt anon ile giue inſtructions exit know boy wel vſurpe grace voice gate action gentlewoman long heare call drunkard husband men themſelues laughter homage peaſant ile counſell haply preſence may well abate ouer-merrie otherwiſe would grow extreames enter aloft drunkard attendants apparel baſon ewer appurtenances lord beg gods pot ale ser wilt pleaſe lord drink cup ser wilt pleaſe honor taſte theſe conſerues ser raiment wil honor weare day beg chriſtophero sly call mee honour lordſhip ne're drank life giue conſerues giue conſerues beefe nere ask raiment ile weare haue doublets backes legges feet nay feete toes looke ouer-leather lord heauen ceaſe idle humor honor oh mightie man diſcent poſſeſſions high eſteeme infuſed foule beg would knaue chriſtendome beſtraught here's— man oh makes ladie mourne mar oh makes droop lord hence comes kindred houſe beaten hence lunacie oh noble lord bethinke birth call home ancient thoughts life lord indeede tinker chriſtopher slie well bring ladie hither againe pot o' th ale man wilt pleaſe mightineſſe waſh hands oh ioy wit reſtor'd oh knew theſe fifteene yeeres haue bin dreame wak'd expreſſely charg'd perill incurre former malady yet abſent bed hope reaſon excuſe beg may hardly tarry long would loth fall dreames againe wil therefore tarrie deſpight fleſh blood enter meſſenger meſ labour great hercules let alcides twelue petr sir vnderſtand inſooth yongeſt daughter hearken father keepes acceſſe promiſe man vntill elder firſt wed yonger free tranio man muſt vs amongſt reſt diſſemble bianca beleeue men aliue neuer yet beheld face could fancie kate minion lyeſt is't hortenſio bian affect heere ile pleade haue kate oh belike fancie riches wil haue gremio keepe faire bian meruaylous forward pet oh pardon gremio would faine gre doubt curſe wooing neighbors guift gratefull expreſſe like kindneſſe haue beene kindely beholding freely giue vnto yong scholler hath beene long boldneſſe mine owne cittie heere make daughter vnto bianca faire vertuous firme reſolue vnknowne preferment eldeſt liberty requeſt vpon knowledge parentage may haue welcome reſt woo free acceſſe verie welcome take lute bookes go pupils preſently holla within enter seruant sirrah leade theſe gentlemen daughters tell theſe tutors bid vſe well go walke little orchard dinner paſſing welcome pray thinke pet signior baptiſta buſineſſe asketh haſte euerie day cannot come woo knew father well left heire lands goods haue bettered rather decreaſt tell get daughters loue dowrie haue wife bap death one halfe lands poſſeſsion twentie thouſand crownes pet dowrie ile aſſure widdow-hood lands leaſes whatſoeuer let therefore drawne betweene vs couenants may kept either hand bap thing well obtain'd loue pet nothing tell father peremptorie proud minded two raging fires meete together conſume thing feedes furie though little fire growes great little winde yet extreme guſts blow fire yeelds rough aſſurance dowre marriage one baptiſtas daughter heere theſe circumſtances ile inſtruct go cloath becomes exeunt actus quartus scena prima enter katherina grumio gru forſooth dare life ka wrong appears marrie famiſh beggers come vnto fathers doore vpon intreatie haue preſent almes elſewhere meete charitie neuer knew intreat neuer needed intreate meate▪ giddie lacke oathes kept waking brawling fed theſe wants vnder name perfect loue eate▪ deadly elſe preſent death prethee go get repaſt care holſome gru neats foote kate paſsing good prethee let haue gru feare chollericke meate fat tripe finely broyl'd kate like well good grumio fetch gru cannot tell feare chollericke peece beefe muſtard kate diſh loue feede vpon gru muſtard hot little kate beefe let muſtard reſt gru nay wil haue muſtard int firſt demand many horſe duke par fiue thouſand weake vnſeruiceable troopes commanders verie poore rogues vpon reputation credit hope liue int shall downe anſwer par ile take sacrament on't way all's one ber paſt-ſauing cap y'are deceiu'd lord mounſieur parrolles gallant militariſt owne phraſe whole theoricke warre knot practiſe chape dagger cap neuer truſt man againe keeping cleane beleeue haue euerie thing wearing apparrell neatly int well that's downe par fiue thouſand horſe true thereabouts downe ile truth cap he's neere truth ber con thankes for't nature deliuers par poore rogues vpon file dukes letters tent int heere heere's paper reade par know ber interpreter do's well cap excellently int dian counts foole full gold par dukes letter aduertiſement proper maide florence one diana take heede allurement one count roſſillion fooliſh idle boy ruttiſh pray put vp againe int nay ile reade firſt fauour par meaning in't proteſt honeſt behalfe maid knew young count dangerous laſciuious boy whale virginity deuours vp fry finds ber damnable both-ſides rogue int let oathes hid drop gold take neuer payes halfe won match well made match well make nere payes debts take dian told men mell boyes kis count counts fool know payes owe thine vow'd thine eare parolles ber whipt armie rime in's forehead cap deuoted friend manifold linguiſt army-potent ber could endure thing cat he's cat int perceiue generals lookes wee faine hang par life caſe afraide dye offences beeing many would repent remainder nature let liue dungeon i' th may liue int wee'le may bee done confeſſe freely therefore captaine dumaine haue anſwer'd reputation duke valour honeſtie par egge cloiſter rapes rauiſhments paralels neſſus hee profeſſes keeping oaths breaking em hercules lye volubilitie would doe man honour certaine cap hath out-villain'd villanie farre raritie redeemes ber pox he's cat int qualities poore price neede aske gold corrupt reuolt par sir cardceue fee-ſimple inheritance cut th' intaile remainders perpetuall perpetually int what's brother captain dumain cap do's aske int what's par e'ne crow a' th neſt altogether great firſt goodneſſe greater great deale euill excels brother coward yet brother reputed one beſt retreate hee outrunnes lackey marrie comming hee ha's crampe int life vndertake betray florentine par captaine horſe count roſſillion int ile whiſper generall knowe pleaſure par ile drumming plague drummes onely deſerue well beguile o' laſciuious yong boy count haue run danger yet would haue ambuſh taken int remedy muſt dye generall haue traitorouſly diſcouerd army made peſtifferous reports men nobly held world honeſt vſe therefore muſt dye come headeſman head par lord let liue let death int take leaue friends looke know heere count kinde dukes vio faire behauiour captaine though nature beauteous wall doth oft cloſe pollution yet beleeue haſt minde faire outward charracter prethee ile pay bounteouſly conceale ayde diſguiſe haply ma muſt confine within modeſt limits order confine ile confine finer theſe cloathes good enough drinke bee theſe boots let hang themſelues owne ma quaffing drinking vndoe heard lady talke yeſterday fooliſh knight brought one night hir woer sir andrew ague-cheeke ma he's tall man any's illyria ma what's th' purpoſe ha's three thouſand ducates yeare ma hee'l haue yeare theſe ducates he's foole prodigall fie you'l playes o' th viol-de-ga three four languages word word without booke hath good gifts nature ma hath indeed almoſt naturall beſides he's foole he's great quarreller hee hath gift coward allay guſt hath quarrelling thought among prudent would quickely haue gift graue tob hand ma adde moreour hee's drunke nightly company drinking healths neece ile drinke long paſſage throat drinke illyria he's coward coyſtrill drinke neece▪ till braines turne o' th toe like pariſh top wench caſtiliano vulgo coms sir andrew agueface enter sir andrew sir toby belch toby belch sweet andrew bleſſe faire shrew mar tob accoſt sir andrew accoſt what's neeces chamber-maid ma good miſtris accoſt deſire better acquaintance ma name mary good miſtris mary accoſt miſtake knight accoſt front boord woe aſſayle troth would vndertake company meaning accoſt ma far well gentlemen let part sir andrew would mightſt neuer draw agen part miſtris would might neuer draw agen faire lady doe thinke haue fooles hand ma sir haue hand marry haue heeres hand ma thought free pray bring hand buttry barre let drinke wherefore what's metaphor ma it's dry thinke aſſe keepe hand dry what's ieſt ma dry ieſt sir full ma sir haue fingers ends marry let go hand barren exit maria knight lack'ſt cup canarie put downe neuer life thinke vnleſſe canarie put downe mee thinkes haue wit chriſtian ordinary man ha's great eater beefe beleeue harme wit queſtion thought i'de forſweare ile ride home morrow toby pur-quoy deere knight purquoy would beſtowed time tongues haue fencing dancing beare-bayting followed arts hadſt excellent head haire would haue mended haire paſt queſtion coole nature becoms wel enough doſt excellent hangs like flax diſtaffe hope huſwife take legs faith ile home morrow toby niece wil it's four one none count himſelfe hard wooes shee'l none o' th count match aboue hir degree neither eſtate yeares wit haue heard tut there's life in't man ile moneth longer fellow o' th minde i' th world delight maskes reuels altogether art good theſe kicke-chawſes knight man illyria whatſoeuer vnder degree betters yet compare old man excellence galliard knight faith cut caper cut mutton too't thinke haue backe-tricke man illyria wherefore theſe things hid wherefore haue theſe gifts curtaine like take duſt like miſtris mals picture doſt goe church galliard come home carranto verie walke iigge would much make water sinke-a-pace dooeſt meane world hide vertues thinke excellent conſtitution legge form'd vnder galliard indifferent well dam'd colour'd shall reuels elſe borne vnder taurus taurus heart leggs thighes let caper ha higher ha ha excellent exeunt scena quarta enter valentine viola mans attire val duke continue theſe fauours towards ceſario like much aduanc'd hath known three dayes already vio either feare humour negligence call queſtion continuance loue inconſtant fauours beleeue enter duke curio attendants vio thanke heere comes count duke ceſario hoa vio attendance lord heere du stand a-while aloofe ceſario knowſt leſſe haue vnclaſp'd booke euen therefore good youth addreſſe gate vnto deni'de acceſſe doores tell fixed foot grow till haue audience sure noble lord abandon'd neuer admit du clamorous leape ciuill bounds rather make vnprofited returne vio say lord du vnfold paſsion loue surprize diſcourſe deere faith become well act woes attend better youth nuntio's graue aſpect vio thinke lord du deere lad beleeue yet belye happy yeeres art man dianas lip rubious pipe maidens organ womans part know conſtellation right apt affayre foure fiue attend beſt leaſt companie proſper well liue freely lord call fortunes thine ile beſt woe lady yet barrefull ere woe would wife exeunt scena quinta enter maria clowne ma nay either tell haſt bin open lippes wide briſsle may enter way excuſe lady hang abſence clo let hang hee well hang'de world needs feare colours ma make good clo none feare ma good lenton anſwer tell yt borne feare colours clo good miſtris mary ma warrs may bolde foolerie clo well god giue wiſedome haue thoſe fooles let vſe talents ma yet hang'd long abſent turn'd away good hanging clo many good hanging preuents bad marriage turning away let beare ma reſolute clo neyther reſolu'd two points ma one breake hold breake gaskins fall clo apt good faith apt well go way toby would leaue drinking wert witty piece eues fleſh illyria ma peace rogue o' comes lady make excuſe wiſely beſt enter lady oliuia maluolio clo wit and't put good fooling thoſe wits thinke haue doe oft proue fooles iacke may paſſe wiſe man quinapalus better witty foole fooliſh wit miſtris alone adieu good madam neuer maſters teares deplore ol yet come againe perhaps mayſt moue heart abhorres like loue exeunt scoena secunda enter sir toby sir andrew fabian faith ile iot longer reaſon deere venom giue reaſon fab muſt neede yeelde reaſon sir andrew marry neece fauours counts seruing-man euer beſtow'd vpon mee i' th orchard old boy tell plaine fab great argument loue toward s'light make aſſe o'me fab proue legitimate vpon oathes iudgement reaſon haue beene grand iurie men noah saylor fab shee fauour youth onely exaſperate awake dormouſe valour put fire heart brimſtone liuer haue accoſted excellent ieſts fire-new mint haue bangd youth dumbeneſſe look'd hand ulkt double gilt opportunitie let time waſh off▪ north ladies opinion hang like yſickle dutchmans beard vnleſſe redeeme laudable attempt either valour policie and't way muſt valour policie hate liefe browniſt politician build fortunes vpon baſis valour challenge counts youth hurt eleuen places neece sir andrew fa deere manakin sir toby haue beene deere lad two thouſand fa haue rare letter you'le deliuer't neuer truſt meanes youth anſwer thinke oxen waine-ropes cannot hale together andrew open'd finde much blood liuer clog foote flea ile eate reſt th' anatomy fab oppoſit youth beares viſage great preſage cruelty enter maria looke youngeſt wren mine comes mar deſire laughe follow yond gull maluolio turned heathen verie renegatho chriſtian meanes beleeuing rightly euer beleeue impoſſible paſſages groſſeneſſe hee's yellow croſſe garter'd mar moſt villanouſly like pedant keepes schoole i' th church haue dogg'd like murtherer obey euery point letter dropt betray face lynes new mappe augmentation indies haue thing tis hardly forbeare hu ling things know ladie doe hee'l take't great fauour come bring vs bring vs exeunt omnes scaena tertia enter sebaſtian anthonio seb would troubled make pleaſure paines chide ant could behinde deſire filed forth loue though much might haue drawne anthonio anſwer make thankes thankes euer oft good turnes vncurrant pay worth conſcience firme finde better dealing what's shall go reliques towne ant morrow beſt firſt go lodging seb weary long night heere vnfold though lately intended keepe darkeneſſe occaſion reueales ripe doſt know hath newly paſt betweene youth prieſt contract eternall bond loue confirm'd mutuall ioynder hands atteſted holy cloſe lippes strengthned enterchangement rings ceremonie compact seal'd function teſtimony since watch hath told toward graue haue trauail'd two houres du diſſembling cub wilt time hath grizzle caſe elſe craft quickely grow thine owne trip thine ouerthrow farewell take direct feete henceforth may neuer meet vio lord proteſt ol hold little faith though haſt much feare enter sir andrew loue god surgeon one preſently toby ol what's matter h'as broke head a-croſſe giuen sir toby bloody coxcombe loue god helpe rather forty pound home ol done andrew counts gentleman one ceſario tooke coward hee's verie diuell incardinate du gentleman ceſario odd's lifelings heere broke head nothing do't toby vio neuer hurt drew vpon without cauſe beſpake faire hurt enter toby clowne bloody coxcombe hurt haue hurt thinke nothing bloody coxecombe heere comes toby halting heare beene drinke hee would haue tickel'd gates du gentleman iſt that's one hurt there's th' end on't sot didſt dicke surgeon clo he's drunke toby houre agone eyes eight i' th morning he's rogue paſſy meaſures panyn hate drunken rogue ol away hath made hauocke ile helpe toby becauſe we'll dreſt together helpe aſſe-head coxcombe knaue thin fac'd knaue gull ol get bed let hurt look'd enter sebaſtian seb madam haue hurt kinſman beene brother blood muſt haue done leſſe wit throw regard vpon perceiue hath offended pardon one euen vowes made late ago du one face one voice one habit two perſons naturall perſpectiue seb anthonio deere anthonio haue houres rack'd tortur'd since haue loſt ant sebaſtian seb fear'ſt anthonio ant haue made diuiſion apple cleft two twin theſe two creatures sebaſtian ol moſt wonderfull seb neuer brother deity nature heere euery blinde waues haue deuour'd charity kinne countreyman name parentage meſſaline sebaſtian father sebaſtian brother went watery tombe aſſume forme come fright vs seb indeed dimenſion groſſely clad wombe participate woman reſt goes euen teares let fall vpon cheeke thrice welcome drowned viola vio father moale vpon brow seb mine vio dide day viola birth numbred thirteene yeares seb record liuely finiſhed indeed mortall acte day made thirteene yeares vio nothing lets make vs happie maſculine vſurp'd attyre embrace till circumſtance place time fortune co-here iumpe viola confirme ile bring captaine towne lye maiden weeds whoſe gentle helpe preſeru'd noble count occurrence fortune hath beene betweene lady lord seb comes lady haue beene miſtooke nature bias drew would haue bin contracted maid therein life deceiu'd betroth'd maid man du amaz'd right noble blood yet glaſſe true haue moſt happy wracke boy haſt thouſand times neuer loue woman like vio thoſe ouer thoſe keepe true doth orbed continent fire day ftom night du giue hand let womans weedes captaine bring firſt hath maides garments vpon action durance maluolio's gentleman follower ladies ol inlarge fetch maluolio hither yet alas remember poore gentleman he's much diſtract enter clowne letter fabian moſt extracting frenſie mine owne remembrance clearly baniſht cl truely madam holds belzebub end well man caſe may heere writ letter haue giuen't day morning madmans epiſtles goſpels skilles much deliuer'd ol open't read clo looke well edified foole deliuers madman lord madam ol art mad clo madam reade madneſſe ladyſhip haue ought bee muſt allow vox ol prethee reade i' right wits clo madona reade right wits reade thus therefore perpend princeſſe giue eare ol read fab reads lord madam wrong world know though haue put mee darkeneſſe giuen drunken coſine rule ouer yet haue benefit well ladieſhip haue owne letter induced mee put doubt much right much thinke pleaſe leaue duty little vnthought iniury madly vs'd maluolio ol write clo madame du much diſtraction ol see deliuer'd fabian bring hither lord pleaſe theſe things thought thinke well wife one day crowne th' alliance on't pleaſe heere houſe proper coſt du madam moſt apt t' embrace offer maſter quits done much againſt mettle farre beneath tender breeding call'd maſter long heere hand time bee maſters miſtris ol enter maluolio du madman ol lord maluolio mal madam haue done wrong notorious wrong ol haue maluolio mal lady haue pray peruſe letter muſt denie hand write hand phraſe tis inuention none well grant tell modeſtie honor haue giuen cleare lights fauour bad come croſſe-garter'd put yellow frowne vpon toby lighter people acting obedient hope haue impriſon'd kept darke houſe viſited prieſt made moſt notorious gecke gull ere inuention plaid tell ol alas maluolio writing though confeſſe much like charracter queſtion tis marias hand bethinke firſt told waſt mad cam'ſt formes heere preſuppos'd vpon letter prethee content practice hath moſt paſt vpon know grounds authors plaintiffe iudge thine owne cauſe fab good madam heare let quarrell braule come taint condition preſent houre haue wondred hope moſt freely confeſſe toby set deuice againſt maluolio heere vpon vncourteous parts conceiu'd againſt maria writ letter tobyes great importance recompence whereof hath married malice follow'd may rather plucke laughter reuenge iniuries iuſtly weigh'd haue paſt ol alas poore foole haue baffel'd clo borne great atchieue greatneſſe haue greatneſſe throwne vpon one enterlude one topas that's one lotd foole mad remember madam laugh barren raſcall he's gag'd thus whirlegigge time brings reuenges mal ile reueng'd whole packe ol hath bene moſt notoriouſly abus'd du purſue entreate peace hath told vs captaine yet knowne golden time conuents combination made deere meane time part hence ceſaerio come man habites orſino's miſtris fancies queene exeunt clowne little tine boy hey ho winde raine fooliſh thing toy raine raineth euery day came mans eſtate hey ho gainſt knaues theeues men gate raine came alas wine hey ho could neuer thriue raine came vnto beds hey ho▪ toſpottes drunken heades raine great ago world begon hey ho that's one play done wee'l pleaſe euery day finis winters tale actus primus scoena prima enter camillo archidamus arch chance camillo viſit bohemia like occaſion whereon on-foot haue great difference betwixt bohemia sicilia cam thinke comming summer king sicilia meanes pay bohemia viſitation hee iuſtly owes arch wherein entertainment vs iuſtified loues indeed— cam you— arch verely freedome knowledge cannot magnificence— rare— know wee giue drinkes sences vn-intelligent inſufficience may though cannot prayſe vs little accuſe vs cam pay great deale deare what's giuen freely arch vnderſtanding inſtructs mine honeſtie puts vtterance cam sicilia cannot himſelfe ouer-kind bohemia trayn'd together child-hoods rooted betwixt affection cannot chuſe braunch since mature dignities royall neceſſities made societie encounters though perſonall hath royally attornyed enter-change gifts letters louing embaſſies haue together though abſent hands ouer vaſt embrac'd ends oppoſed winds heauens continue loues arch thinke world either malice matter alter haue vnſpeakable comfort young prince mamillius gentleman greateſt promiſe euer came note cam well agree hopes gallant child one indeed phyſicks subiect makes old hearts freſh went crutches ere borne deſire yet life man arch would elſe content die cam yes excuſe deſire liue arch king sonne would deſire liue crutches till one exeunt scoena secunda enter leontes hermione mamillius polixenes camillo pol nine changes watry-starre hath shepheards note haue left throne without burthen time long againe would fill'd vp brother thanks yet perpetuitie goe hence debt therefore like cypher yet rich place multiply one thanke many thouſands moe goe leo stay thanks pay part pol sir that's morrow queſtion'd feares may chance breed vpon abſence may blow winds home make vs put forth truly beſides haue tyre royaltie leo tougher brother put vs to't pol longer leo one seue'night longer pol morrow leo wee'le part time betweene's ile gaine-ſaying pol preſſe tongue moues none none i' th' world could win neceſſitie requeſt although needfull deny'd affaires doe euen drag home-ward hinder loue whip charge trouble farewell brother leo tongue-ty'd queene thought sir haue held peace vntill drawne oathes sir charge coldly tell bohemia's well by-gone-day proclaym'd he's beat beſt ward leo well hermione tell longs sonne let let goe let wee'l thwack hence diſtaffes yet royall preſence ile aduenture borrow weeke bohemia take lord ile giue commiſſion let moneth behind geſt prefix'd for's parting yet good-deed leontes loue iarre o' th' clock behind lady lord you'le pol madame nay pol may verely verely put limber vowes though would t' vnſphere stars oaths yet sir going verely goe ladyes verely potent lords goe yet force keepe priſoner like gueſt pay fees depart thanks priſoner gueſt dread verely one pol gueſt madame priſoner import offending leſſe eaſie commit puniſh gaoler kind hoſteſſe come ile queſtion lords tricks boyes pretty lordings pol faire queene two lads thought behind day morrow day boy eternall lord verver wag o' th' two pol twyn'd lambs frisk i' th' sun bleat one th' chang'd innocence innocence knew doctrine ill-doing dream'd purſu'd life weake spirits ne're higher rear'd blood haue anſwer'd heauen boldly guilty impoſition clear'd hereditarie gather haue tript pol moſt lady temptations haue borne to's thoſe vnfledg'd dayes wife girle precious croſs'd eyes young play fellow grace boot make concluſion leaſt queene deuils yet goe th' offences haue made doe wee'le anſwere firſt vs vs continue fault vs leo woon yet hee'le lord leo requeſt would hermione deareſt neuer better purpoſe neuer leo neuer haue twice well was't prethee tell cram's prayſe make's fat tame things one good deed dying tongueleſſe slaughters thouſand▪ wayting vpon prayſes wages may ride's one kiſſe thouſand furlongs ere spur heat acre th' goale laſt good deed entreat firſt ha's elder siſter miſtake would name grace th' purpoſe nay let haue't long leo three crabbed moneths themſelues death ere could make open white hand clap loue didſt vtter euer grace indeed lo-you haue th' purpoſe twice one euer earn'd royall husband th' friend leo hot hot mingle friendſhip farre mingling bloods haue tremor cordis heart daunces ioy ioy entertainment may free face put deriue libertie heartineſſe bountie fertile boſome well become agent may graunt padling palmes pinching fingers making practis'd smiles looking-glaſſe mort o' th' deere oh entertainment boſome likes browes mamillius art boy mam good lord leo i' fecks that's bawcock has't noſe coppy mine come captaine muſt neat neat cleanly captaine yet steere heycfer calfe call'd neat still virginalling vpon palme wanton calfe art calfe mam yes lord leo want'ſt rough paſh haue full like yet almoſt like egges women thing falſe o're-dy'd blacks wind waters falſe dice wiſh'd one fixes borne mine yet true boy like come sir page looke welkin eye villaine moſt dear'ſt collop dam may't affection intention center do'ſt make poſſible things held communicat'ſt dreames what's vnreall coactiue art fellow'ſt nothing credent may'ſt co-ioyne do'ſt beyond commiſſion find infection braines hardning browes pol meanes sicilia vnſetled pol lord leo cheere is't beſt brother look held brow much diſtraction mou'd lord leo good earneſt nature betray it's folly it's tenderneſſe make paſtime harder boſomes looking lynes boyes face thoughts requoyle twentie three yeeres vn-breech'd greene veluet coat dagger muzzel leaſt bite it's maſter proue ornaments oft do's dangerous like thought kernell squaſh gentleman mine honeſt friend take egges money mam lord ile fight leo happy man be's dole brother fond young prince doe pol home sir he's exerciſe mirth matter friend mine enemy paraſite souldier stateſ-man makes iulyes day december varying child-neſſe cures thoughts would thick blood leo squire offic'd two walke lord leaue grauer hermione lou'ſt vs brothers welcome let deare sicily cheape next young rouer he's apparant heart would vs i' th' garden attend leo owne bents diſpoſe you'le found beneath sky angling though perceiue giue lyne goe goe holds vp neb byll armes boldneſſe wife allowing husband gone already ynch-thick knee-deepe ore head eares fork'd one goe play boy play mother playes play diſgrac'd part whoſe iſſue hiſſe graue contempt clamor knell goe play boy play haue much deceiu'd cuckolds ere many man euen preſent holds wife th' arme little thinkes ha's in's abſence pond fiſh'd next neighbor sir smile neighbor nay there's comfort in't whiles men haue gates thoſe gates open'd mine againſt deſpaire haue reuolted wiues tenth mankind would hang themſelues phyſick for't there's none bawdy planet predominant powrefull thinke eaſt weſt north south concluded barricodo belly know't let enemy bag baggage many thouſand on's haue diſeaſe feele't boy mam like leo that's comfort camillo cam good lord leo goe play mamillius thou'rt honeſt man camillo great sir yet longer cam much adoe make anchor hold caſt came home leo didſt note cam would petitions made buſineſſe materiall leo didſt perceiue they're already whiſp'ring rounding sicilia farre gone guſt laſt cam't camillo cam good queenes entreatie leo queenes be't good pertinent taken vnderſtanding pate thine conceit draw common blocks noted is't finer natures seueralls head-peece extraordinarie lower meſſes perchance buſineſſe purblind cam buſineſſe lord thinke moſt vnderſtand bohemia longer leo ha cam stayes longer leo cam highneſſe entreaties moſt gracious miſtreſſe leo satisfie th' entreaties miſtreſſe satisfie let haue truſted camillo neereſt things heart well chamber-councels wherein prieſt-like haſt cleans'd boſome departed penitent reform'd haue deceiu'd integritie deceiu'd cam forbid lord leo bide vpon't art honeſt inclin'ſt way art coward hoxes honeſtie behind reſtrayning courſe requir'd elſe muſt counted seruant grafted truſt therein negligent elſe foole game play'd home rich stake drawne tak'ſt ieaſt cam gracious lord may negligent fooliſh fearefull euery one theſe man free negligence folly feare among infinite doings world sometime puts forth affaires lord euer wilfull-negligent folly induſtriouſly play'd foole negligence weighing well end euer fearefull doe thing iſſue doubted whereof execution cry againſt non-performance feare oft infects wiſeſt theſe lord allow'd infirmities honeſtie neuer free beſeech grace plainer let know treſpas it's owne viſage deny none mine leo ha' camillo that's paſt doubt haue eye-glaſſe thicker cuckolds horne heard viſion apparant rumor cannot mute thought cogitation reſides man do's thinke wife wilt confeſſe elſe impudently negatiue haue eyes eares thought wife's holy-horſe deſerues name ranke flax-wench puts troth-plight iuſtify't cam would heare soueraigne miſtreſſe clouded without preſent vengeance taken heart neuer become leſſe reiterate deepe though true leo whiſpering nothing leaning cheeke cheeke meating noſes kiſſing in-ſide lip ca iere laughter note infallible breaking honeſtie horſing foot foot skulking corners wiſhing clocks houres minutes noone mid-night eyes blind pin web onely would vnſeene wicked nothing world that's in't nothing couering skie nothing bohemia nothing wife nothing nothing haue theſe nothings nothing cam good lord cur'd diſeas'd opinion betimes moſt dangerous leo say true cam lord leo lye lye lyeſt camillo hate pronounce groſſe lowt mindleſſe slaue elſe houering temporizer canſt thine eyes good euill inclining wiues liuer infected life would liue running one glaſſe cam do's infect leo weares like medull hanging neck bohemia seruants true bare eyes alike mine honor profits owne particular thrifts would doe vndoe cup-bearer meaner forme haue bench'd rear'd worſhip may'ſt plainely heauen earth▪ earth heauen gall'd might'ſt be-ſpice cup giue mine enemy laſting winke draught cordiall cam sir lord could doe raſh potion lingring dram worke maliciouſly like poyſon cannot beleeue crack dread miſtreſſe honorable haue lou'd leo make queſtion goe rot do'ſt thinke muddy vnſetled appoint vexation su ly puritie whiteneſſe sheetes preſerue sleepe go es thornes nettles tayles waſpes giue blood o' th' prince sonne doe thinke mine ioue mine without ripe mouing to't would doe could man blench cam muſt beleeue sir doe fetch bohemia for't prouided hee's remou'd highneſſe take againe queene firſt euen sonnes thereby iniurie tongues courts kingdomes knowne ally'd leo do'ſt aduiſe euen mine owne courſe haue downe ile giue blemiſh honor none cam lord goe countenance cleare friendſhip weares feaſts keepe bohemia queene cup-bearer haue wholeſome beueridge account seruant leo do't haſt one halfe heart do't thine owne cam ile do't lord leo wil friendly haſt aduis'd exit cam miſerable lady caſe muſt poyſoner good polixenes ground do't obedience maſter one rebellion himſelfe haue doe deed promotion followes could find example thouſand's anoynted kings flouriſh'd il'd do't braſſe stone parchment beares one let villanie forſwear't muſt forſake court do't certaine breake-neck happy starre raigne comes bohemia enter polixenes pol thinkes fauor begins warpe good day camillo cam hayle moſt royall sir pol newes i' th' court cam none rare lord pol king hath countenance loſt prouince region lou'd loues himſelfe euen met cuſtomarie complement hee wafting eyes th' contrary falling lippe much contempt leaues conſider breeding changes thus manners cam dare know lord pol dare doe doe know dare intelligent thereabouts doe know muſt cannot dare good camillo chang'd complexions mirror mine chang'd muſt partie alteration finding thus alter'd with't cam puts vs diſtemper cannot name diſeaſe caught yet well pol caught make like baſiliſque haue look'd thouſands haue better regard kill'd none camillo certainely gentleman thereto clerke-like experienc'd leſſe adornes gentry parents noble names whoſe gentle beſeech know ought do's behoue knowledge thereof inform'd impriſon't ignorant concealement cam may anſwere pol sickneſſe caught yet well muſt anſwer'd do'ſt heare camillo coniure parts man honor do's acknowledge whereof leaſt suit mine declare incidencie do'ſt gheſſe harme creeping toward farre neere way preuented beſt beare cam sir tell since charg'd honor thinke honorable therefore marke counſaile muſt eu'n followed meane vtter cry loſt good night pol good camillo cam appointed murther pol camillo cam king pol cam thinkes nay confidence beene inſtrument vice to't haue toucht queene forbiddenly pol oh beſt blood turne infected gelly name yoak'd betray beſt turne freſheſt reputation may dulleſt noſthrill arriue approch nay hated worſe great'ſt infection ere heard read cam sweare thought ouer particular starre heauen influences may well forbid sea obey moone oath remoue counſaile fabrick folly whoſe foundation pyl'd vpon faith continue body pol grow cam know auoid what's growne queſtion borne therefore dare truſt honeſtie lyes encloſed trunke shall beare along impawnd away night followers whiſper buſineſſe twoes threes poſternes cleare o' th' citie ile put fortunes diſcouerie loſt vncertaine honor parents haue vttred truth proue dare one condemnd kings owne mouth thereon execution pol doe beleeue heart in's face giue hand pilot places still neighbour mine ships ready people expect hence departure two dayes agoe iealouſie precious creature rare muſt great perſon's mightie muſt violent do's conceiue diſhonor'd man euer profeſs'd reuenges muſt made bitter feare ore-ſhades good expedition friend comfort gracious queene part theame nothing ill-ta'ne come camillo reſpect father bear'ſt life hence let vs auoid cam mine authoritie command keyes poſternes pleaſe highneſſe take vrgent houre come sir away exeunt actus secundus scena prima enter hermione mamillius ladies leontes antigonus lords take boy troubles paſt enduring lady come gracious lord shall play-fellow mam ile none lady lord mam you'le kiſſe hard baby loue better lady lord mam becauſe browes blacker yet black-browes become women beſt much haire cemicircle halfe-moone made pen lady taught mam learn'd womens faces pray colour eye-browes lady blew lord mam nay that's mock haue ladies noſe ha's beene blew eye-browes lady harke ye queene mother rounds apace preſent fine new prince one theſe dayes youl'd wanton vs would haue lady late goodly bulke good time encounter wiſdome amongſt come sir againe vs tell's tale mam merry merry mam tale's beſt winter haue one sprights goblins let's haue good sir come-on downe come-on doe beſt fright sprights you're powrefull mam man nay come downe mam dwelt church-yard tell yond crickets heare come giu't mine care leon hee met traine camillo lord behind tuft pines met neuer saw men way eyed euen ships leo bleſt iuſt cenſure true opinion alack leſſer knowledge accurs'd bleſt may cup spider one may drinke depart yet partake venome knowledge infected one preſent th' abhor'd ingredient eye make knowne hath drunke cracks gorge violent hefts haue drunke spider camillo helpe pandar plot againſt life crowne all's true miſtruſted falſe villaine employ'd pre-employ'd ha's diſcouer'd deſigne remaine pinch'd thing yea trick play came poſternes eaſily open lord great authority often hath leſſe preuail'd command leo know't well giue boy glad nurſe though do's beare yet haue much blood sport leo beare boy hence come away let big-with polixenes ha's made thus il'd ile would beleeue e're leaue th' nay-ward leo lords looke marke well goodly lady iuſtice hearts thereto adde pitty honeſt honorable prayſe without-dore-forme faith deſerues high shrug hum ha theſe petty-brands calumnie doth vſe oh mercy do's calumnie feare vertue theſe shrugs theſe hum's ha's haue goodly come betweene ere honeſt be't knowne ha's moſt cauſe grieue shee's adultreſſe villaine moſt repleniſh'd villaine world much villaine lord doe miſtake leo haue miſtooke lady polixenes leontes thing ile call creature place leaſt barbariſme making precedent like language vſe degrees mannerly diſtinguiſhment leaue betwixt prince begger haue shee's adultreſſe haue traytor camillo federarie one knowes know moſt vild principall bed-ſwaruer euen bad thoſe vulgars giue bold'ſt titles priuy late eſcape life priuy none grieue come clearer knowledge thus haue publiſh'd gentle lord right throughly miſtake leo miſtake thoſe foundations build vpon centre bigge enough beare schoole-boyes top away priſon farre-off guiltie there's ill planet raignes muſt patient till heauens looke aſpect fauorable good lords prone weeping sex commonly want vaine dew perchance dry pitties haue honorable griefe lodg'd burnes worſe teares drowne beſeech lords thoughts qualified charities shall beſt inſtruct meaſure kings perform'd leo shall heard is't goes beſeech highnes women may plight requires doe weepe good fooles cauſe know miſtris ha's deſeru'd priſon abound teares come action goe better grace adieu lord neuer wiſh'd truſt women come haue leaue leo goe doe bidding hence lord beſeech highneſſe call queene againe antig certaine sir leaſt iuſtice proue violence three great ones selfe queene sonne lord lord dare life lay downe do't sir pleaſe t' accept queene i' th' eyes heauen meane accuſe antig proue shee's otherwiſe ile keepe stables lodge wife ile goe couples feele farther truſt euery ynch woman world euery dram womans fleſh falſe leo hold peaces lord good lord antig abus'd putter damn'd for't would knew villaine would land-damne honor-flaw'd haue three daughters eldeſt eleuen third nine fiue proue true they'l pay for't mine honor ile gell'd em fourteene bring falſe generations co-heyres rather glib produce faire iſſue leo ceaſe buſineſſe cold dead-mans noſe feel't feele thus withall inſtruments feele antig neede graue burie honeſty there's graine face whole dungy-earth leo lacke credit lord rather lacke lord vpon ground would content haue honor true blam'd for't might leo neede commune rather follow forcefull inſtigation prerogatiue cals counſailes naturall goodneſſe imparts skill cannot relliſh truth like vs informe neede aduice matter loſſe gaine ord'ring on't properly ours▪ antig wiſh liege onely iudgement tride without ouerture leo could either art moſt ignorant age wer't borne foole camillo's flight added familiarity groſſe euer touch'd coniecture lack'd onely nought approbation onely circumſtances made vp deed doth puſh-on proceeding yet greater confirmation acte importance moſt pitteous wilde haue diſpatch'd poſt delphos appollo's temple cleomines dion know oracle bring whoſe counſaile shall haue done well lord well done lord leo though neede know yet oracle giue reſt th' mindes others whoſe ignorant credulitie come vp th' truth haue thought good free perſon confinde leaſt treachery two fled hence left performe come follow vs publique buſineſſe raiſe vs antig laughter take good truth knowne exeunt scena secunda enter paulina gentleman gaoler emilia paul keeper priſon call let haue knowledge good lady court europe good doſt priſon good sir know gao worthy lady one much honour pau pray conduct queene gao may madam contrary haue expreſſe commandment pau here's a-do locke vp honeſty honour th' acceſſe gentle viſitors is't lawfull pray women emilia gao pleaſe madam put a-part theſe attendants shall bring emilia forth pau pray call with-draw gao madam muſt preſent conference pau well be't prethee heere's a-doe make paſſes colouring deare gentlewoman fares gracious lady emil well one great forlorne may hold together frights greefes neuer tender lady hath borne greater time deliuer'd pau boy emil daughter goodly babe luſty like liue queene receiues much comfort in't sayes poore priſoner innocent pau dare theſe dangerous vnſafe lunes i' th' king beſhrew muſt told on't office becomes woman beſt ile take't vpon proue hony-mouth'd let tongue bliſter neuer red-look'd anger bee trumpet pray emilia commend beſt obedience queene dares truſt little babe i'le king vndertake bee aduocate th' lowd'ſt know may o' th' childe often pure innocence perſwades failes emil moſt worthy madam honor goodneſſe euident free vndertaking cannot miſſe thriuing yſſue lady liuing meete great errand pleaſe ladiſhip viſit next roome ile preſently acquaint queene moſt noble offer day hammered deſigne durſt tempt miniſter honour leaſt deny'd paul tell emilia ile vſe tongue haue wit flow from't boldneſſe boſome le't doubted good emil bleſt ile queene pleaſe come neerer gao madam if't pleaſe queene babe know incurre paſſe hauing warrant pau neede feare childe priſoner wombe law proceſſe great nature thence free'd enfranchis'd partie anger king guilty treſpaſſe queene gao beleeue paul feare vpon mine honor betwixt danger exeunt scaena tertia enter leontes seruants paulina antigonus lords leo night day reſt weakneſſe beare matter thus meere weakneſſe cauſe part o' th' cauſe th' adultreſſe harlot-king quite beyond mine arme blanke leuell braine plot-proofe hooke gone giuen fire moity reſt might come againe whoſe ser lord leo do's boy ser tooke good reſt night hop'd diſcharg'd leo nobleneſſe conceyuing diſhonour mother declin'd droop'd tooke deeply faſten'd fix'd on't himſelfe threw-off spirit appetite sleepe down-right languiſh'd leaue goe see fares fie fie thought thought reuenges way recoyle vpon himſelfe mightie parties alliance let vntill time may preſent vengeance take camillo polixenes laugh make paſtime laugh could reach shall within powre enter paulina lord muſt enter paul nay rather good lords feare tyrannous paſsion alas queenes life gracious innocent free iealous antig that's enough ser madam hath night commanded none come pau hot good sir come bring creepe like needleſſe heauings nouriſh cauſe awaking come words medicinall true honeſt either purge humor preſſes leo noyſe hoe pau noyſe lord needfull conference goſsips highneſſe leo away audacious lady antigonus charg'd come knew would ant told lord diſpleaſures perill mine viſit leo canſt rule paul diſhoneſtie vnleſſe take courſe haue done commit committing honor truſt rule ant la-you heare take raine let run paul good liege come beſeech heare profeſſes loyall seruant phyſitian moſt obedient counſailor yet dares leſſe appeare comforting euilles moſt come good queene leo good queene paul good queene lord good queene good queene would combate make good man worſt leo force hence pau let makes trifles eyes firſt hand mine owne accord ile firſt ile errand good queene good hath brought forth daughter heere commends bleſsing leo mankinde witch hence o'dore moſt intelligencing bawd paul ignorant entit'ling leſſe honeſt mad enough ile warrant world goes paſſe honeſt leo traitors puſh giue baſtard dotard art woman-tyr'd vnrooſted dame partlet heere take vp baſtard take't vp giue't croane paul euer vnvenerable hands tak'ſt vp princeſſe forced baſeneſſe ha's put vpon't leo dreads wife paul would paſt doubt youl'd call children leo neſt traitors ant none good light pau one that's heere that's himſelfe honor himſelfe queenes hopefull sonnes babes betrayes slander whoſe swords caſe curſe cannot compell'd too't remoue root opinion rotten euer oake stone leo callat boundleſſe tongue late hath beat husband bayts brat none mine iſſue polixenes hence together dam commit fire paul might th' old prouerb charge like worſe behold lords although print little whole matter coppy father eye noſe lippe trick of's frowne fore-head nay valley pretty dimples chin cheeke smiles mold frame hand nayle finger good goddeſſe nature haſt made like got haſt ordering mind colours yellow in't leaſt do's children husbands leo groſſe hagge lozell art worthy hang'd wilt tongue antig hang husbands cannot doe feat you'le leaue hardly one subiect leo take hence paul moſt vnworthy vnnaturall lord doe leo ile burnt paul care heretique makes fire burnes in't ile call tyrant moſt cruell vſage queene able produce accuſation owne weake-hindg'd fancy tyrannie ignoble make yea world leo allegeance chamber tyrant life durſt call know one away paul pray doe puſh ile gone looke babe lord ioue better guiding spirit needs theſe hands thus tender o're follyes neuer doe good one farewell gone exit leo traytor haſt wife child away with't euen haſt heart tender o're take hence inſtantly conſum'd fire euen none take vp within houre bring word done good teſtimonie ile life elſe call'ſt thine refuſe wilt encounter wrath baſtard-braynes theſe proper hands shall daſh goe take fire wife antig sir theſe lords noble fellowes pleaſe cleare in't lords royall liege guiltie comming hither leo you're lyers lord beſeech highneſſe giue vs better credit haue alwayes truly beſeech' eſteeme vs knees begge recompence deare paſt come doe change purpoſe horrible bloody muſt lead foule iſſue kneele leo feather wind blows shall liue baſtard kneele call father better burne curſe let liue neyther sir come hither haue beene tenderly officious lady margerie mid-wife baſtards life baſtard beard's gray aduenture brats life antig thing lord abilitie may vndergoe nobleneſſe impoſe leaſt thus much ile pawne little blood haue left innocent thing poſſible leo poſſible sweare sword wilt performe bidding antig lord leo marke performe faile point in't onely death lewd-tongu'd wife time pardon enioyne art liege-man vs carry female baſtard hence beare remote deſart place quite dominions leaue without mercy owne protection fauour climate fortune came vs doe iuſtice charge soules perill bodyes torture commend place chance may nurſe end take vp antig doe though preſent death beene mercifull come poore babe powerfull spirit inſtruct kytes rauens nurſes wolues beares caſting aſide haue done like offices pitty sir proſperous deed do's require bleſſing againſt crueltie fight poore thing condemn'd loſſe exit leo ile reare anothers iſſue enter seruant seru pleaſe' highneſſe poſts thoſe th' oracle come houre cleomines dion well arriu'd delphos landed haſting th' court lord pleaſe sir hath beene beyond accompt leo twentie three dayes haue beene abſent good fore-tells great apollo haue truth appeare prepare lords summon seſſion may arraigne moſt lady▪ hath publikely accus'd haue iuſt open triall liues heart burthen leaue thinke vpon bidding exeunt actus tertius scena prima enter cleomines dion cleo clymat's delicate ayre moſt fertile iſle faults vpon hermione little like dio violent carriage cleare end buſineſſe oracle thus apollo's great diuine vp shall contents diſcouer rare euen ruſh knowledge goe freſh horſes gracious iſſue exeunt prettie one scape though bookiſh▪ yet reade waiting-gentlewoman beene trunke-worke behinde-doore worke warmer got poore thing heere ile take vp pity yet ile tarry till come hallow'd euen whoa-ho-hoa many reyſons o' th sun aut oh euer borne clo i' th' name aut oh helpe helpe mee plucke theſe ragges death death clo alacke poore haſt need rags lay rather haue theſe aut oh loathſomneſſe offend mee haue receiued mightie ones millions clo alas poore man million beating may come great matter aut rob'd beaten money apparrell tane theſe dereſtable things put vpon clo horſe-man foot-man aut footman footman clo indeed footman garments left bee horſemans coate hath hot lend hand ile helpe come lend hand aut oh good tenderly oh clo alas poore aut oh good good feare clo canſt aut softly deere good ha done charitable office clo doeſt lacke mony haue little mony aut good beſeech haue kinſman paſt three quarters mile hence vnto whome going haue money anie thing want offer money pray killes heart clow manner fellow hee robb'd aut fellow haue knowne goe troll-my-dames knew prince cannot tell good vertues hee certainely whipt court clo vices would there's vertue whipt court cheriſh make yet abide aut vices would sir know man well hath bene ape-bearer proceſſe-ſeruer bayliffe hee compaſt motion prodigall married tinkers wife within mile land liuing lyes hauing flowne ouer many knauiſh profeſſions onely rogue call autolicus clo vpon prig life prig haunts wakes faires beare-baitings aut true hee that's rogue put apparrell clo cowardly rogue bohemia look'd bigge hee'ld haue runne aut muſt confeſſe fighter falſe heart way knew warrant clo aut sweet much better walke euen take leaue pace towards kinſmans clo shall bring way aut good fac'd clo fartheewell muſt go buy spices exit aut proſper purſe hot enough purchaſe spice ile make cheat bring another proue let vnrold name put booke vertue song iog-on iog-on foot-path way merrily hent stile-a merry heart goes day tyres mile-a exit scena quarta enter florizell perdita shepherd clowne polixenes camillo mopſa dorcas seruants autolicus flo theſe vnvſuall weeds part do's giue life shepherdeſſe flora peering aprils front meeting petty gods queene on't perd sir gracious lord chide extreames becomes oh pardon name high gracious marke o' th' land haue obſcur'd swaines wearing poore lowly maide moſt goddeſe-like prank'd vp feaſts euery meſſe haue folly feeders digeſt cuſtome bluſh attyr'd thinke glaſſe flo bleſſe time good falcon made flight a-croſſe fathers ground perd ioue affoord cauſe difference forges dread greatneſſe hath beene vs'd feare euen tremble thinke father accident paſſe way oh pates would looke worke noble vildely bound vp would theſe borrowed flaunts behold preſence flo apprehend nothing iollity goddes themſelues humbling deities loue haue taken beaſts vpon iupiter became bull bellow'd greene neptune ram bleated fire-roab'd-god golden apollo poore humble swaine transformations neuer peece beauty rarer way chaſte deſires run mine honor luſts burne hotter faith perd sir reſolution cannot hold oppos'd muſt th' powre king one theſe two muſt neceſsities muſt change purpoſe life flo deer'ſt perdita theſe forc'd thoughts prethee darken mirth o' th' feaſt ile thine faire fathers cannot mine owne thing thine moſt conſtant though deſtiny merry gentle strangle thoughts theſe thing behold gueſts comming lift vp countenance day celebration nuptiall two haue come perd lady fortune stand auſpicious flo see gueſts approach addreſſe entertaine let's red mirth shep fy daughter old wife liu'd vpon day pantler butler cooke dame seruant welcom'd would dance turne heere vpper end o' th table i' th middle face o' fire labour thing tooke quench would one retyred feaſted one hoſteſſe meeting pray bid theſe vnknowne friends to's welcome way make vs better friends knowne come quench bluſhes preſent miſtris o' th' feaſt come bid vs welcome good flocke proſper perd sir welcome fathers take mee hoſteſſeſhip o' th' day you're welcome giue thoſe flowres dorcas reuerend sirs there's roſemary rue theſe keepe seeming winter long grace remembrance welcome shearing pol shepherdeſſe faire one well fit ages flowres winter perd sir yeare growing ancient yet death birth trembling winter fayreſt flowres o' th carnations gilly-vors call natures baſtards kind ruſticke gardens barren care get pol wherefore gentle maiden neglect perd haue heard art pideneſſe great creating-nature pol say yet nature made better meane nature makes meane ouer art addes nature art nature makes maid marry gentler sien wildeſt stocke make conceyue barke baſer kinde bud nobler race art do's mend nature change rather art nature perd pol make garden rich gilly'vors call baſtards perd ile put dible earth one painted would wiſh youth well onely therefore deſire breed here's flowres hot lauender mints sauory mariorum mary-gold goes bed sun riſes weeping theſe flowres middle thinke giuen men middle age y' welcome cam leaue graſing flocke onely liue gazing perd alas you'ld leane blaſts ianuary would blow fa friend would flowres o' th spring might become time day weare vpon virgin-branches yet maiden-heads growing proſerpina flowres frighted let'ſt fall dyſſes waggon daffadils come swallow dares▪ take windes march beauty violets dim lids iuno's eyes cytherea's breath pale prime-roſes dye vnmarried ere behold bright phoebus maladie moſt incident maids bold oxlips crowne imperiall lillies kinds flowre-de-luce one theſe lacke make garlands friend o're ore flo like coarſe perd like banke loue lye play like coarſe buried quicke mine armes come take flours thinkes play haue whitſo sure robe mine do's change diſpoſition flo still betters done sweet i'ld haue euer i'ld haue buy giue almes sir aut whether lke courtier seeſt ayre court theſe enfoldings hath gate meaſure court receiues noſe court-odour reflect baſeneſſe court-contempt think'ſt inſinuate toaze buſineſſe therefore courtier aut hee ha's sonne flayd aliue ouer honey head waſpes neſt till three quarters dram dead recouer'd againe aquavite hot infuſion raw hoteſt day prognoſtication proclaymes againſt brick-wall sunne looking south-ward eye vpon hee behold flyes blown death talke theſe traitorly-raſcals whoſe miſeries offences capitall tell honeſt plaine men haue king gently conſider'd ile bring aboord tender perſons preſence whiſper behalfes man beſides king effect suites man doe clow great authoritie cloſe giue gold though authoritie re yet hee oft led noſe gold in-ſide purſe out-ſide hand adoe remember brough aut truſt walke toward seaſide goe right hand looke vpon hedge follow clow bleſs'd man may euen bleſs'd shep let's bids vs prouided doe vs good aut mind honeſt fortune would mouth courted double gold means doe prince maſter od▪ knowes may turn backe ncement bring theſe wo aie d-ones aboord him▪ thinke th againe complaint haue king▪ concernes nothing let call rog farre officious proofe fault could make haue redeem'd indeed pay'd downe penitence▪ done treſpas laſt doe heauens haue done forget euill forgiue leo whileſt remember vertues cannot forget blemiſhes thinke wrong much wiues therefore wife one worſe better vs'd▪ would make sainted spirit againe poſſeſſe corps stage offendors appeare soule-vext begin paul power iuſt cauſe leo would incenſe murther marryed paul ghoſt free leaue leo neuer paulina bleſs'd spirit paul good lords beare witneſſe oath cleo tempt ouer-much paul vnleſſe another like hermione picture affront eye cleo good madame haue done paul yet lord marry sir remedie giue office chuſe queene young former walk'd firſt queenes ghoſt take ioy armes leo true paulina marry till bidſt vs paul shall firſt queene's againe breath neuer till enter seruant ser one giues himſelfe prince florizell sonne polixenes princeſſe faireſt haue yet beheld deſires acceſſe high preſence leo comes like fathers greatneſſe approach circumſtance tells vs viſitation fram'd forc'd need accident trayne ser thoſe meane leo princeſſe ser moſt peereleſſe peece earth thinke ere sunne bright paul oh hermione euery preſent time doth boaſt aboue better gone muſt graue giue way what's sir haue writ writing colder theame beene equall'd thus verſe flow'd beautie ebb'd haue better ser pardon madame one haue almoſt forgot pardon ha's obtayn'd eye haue tongue creature would begin sect might quench zeal profeſſors elſe make proſelytes bid follow paul women ser women loue woman worth man men rareſt women leo goe cleomines aſſiſted honor'd friends bring embracement still thus vpon vs exit paul prince iewell children houre payr'd well lord full moneth betweene births leo ceaſe know'ſt dyes againe talk'd-of gentleman bring conſider may vnfurniſh reaſon come enter florizell perdita cleomines others mother moſt true wedlock prince print royall father conceiuing twentie one fathers image hit ayre call brother wildly vs perform'd moſt dearely welcome faire princeſſe goddeſſe oh alas loſt couple heauen earth might thus haue begetting wonder gracious couple doe loſt mine owne folly societie amitie braue father though bearing miſerie deſire life looke flo command haue touch'd sicilia giue greetings king friend brother infirmitie waits vpon worne times hath wiſh'd abilitie himſelfe lands waters throne meaſur'd looke vpon loues bad scepters thoſe beare liuing leo oh brother good gentleman wrongs haue done afreſh within theſe offices rarely kind interpreters behind-hand welcome hither spring th' earth hath expos'd paragon th' fearefull vſage leaſt vngentle dreadfull neptune greet man worth paines much leſſe th' aduenture perſon flo good lord came libia leo warlike smalus noble honor'd lord fear'd lou'd flo moſt royall sir thence whoſe daughter teares proclaym'd parting thence proſperous south-wind friendly haue croſs'd execute charge father gaue viſiting highneſſe beſt traine haue sicilian shores diſmiſs'd bohemia bend onely libia sir france england iohn england men angiers louing fra louing men angiers arthurs trumpet call'd gentle parle iohn aduantage therefore heare vs firſt theſe flagges france aduanced heere eye proſpect towne haue hither march'd endamagement canons haue bowels full wrath ready mounted forth iron indignation walles preparation bloody merciles proceeding theſe french comfort citties eies winking gates approch thoſe waſte doth girdle compulſion ordinance time fixed beds lime bin diſhabited wide hauocke made bloody power ruſh vppon peace vs lawfull king painefully much expedient march haue brought accordingly kinde cittizens let vs king whoſe labour'd fore-wearied action craues harbourage within citie walles france haue make anſwer vs loe right hand whoſe protection moſt diuinely vow'd vpon right holds yong pl tagen sonne elder brother man king ore enioyes downe-troden equity tread warlike march theſe greenes towne enemy conſtraint hoſpitable zeale releefe oppreſſed childe religiouſly prouokes pleaſed pay dutie truly owe owes namely yong prince armes like muzled beare saue aſpect hath offence vp cannons malice vainly againſt th' involuerable clouds heauen bleſſed vn-vext retyre vnhack'd helmets vnbruis'd beare home iuſtie blood againe heere came againſt towne leaue children wiues peace fondly paſſe proffer'd offer rounder old-fac'd walles hide meſſengers warre though theſe verifie title liues fran many well-borne bloods thoſe baſt baſtards fran stand face contradict claime cit till compound whoſe right worthieſt worthieſt hold right iohn god forgiue thoſe euerlaſting hideous death within view retaining quantity life bleeds away euen forme waxe reſolueth figure fire world make deceiue since muſt looſe vſe deceite falſe true muſt dye heere liue hence truth againe lewis win day forſworne ere thoſe eyes behold another day breake eaſt euen night whoſe blacke contagious breath already burning creſt old feeble day-wearied sunne euen ill night breathing expire paying fine rated treachery euen treacherous fine liues lewis aſsiſtance win day commend one hubert king loue reſpect beſides grandſite engliſhman awakes conſcience confeſſe lieu whereof pray beare hence forth noiſe rumour field may thinke remnant thoughts peace part bodie contemplation deuout deſires sal beleeue beſhrew loue fauour forme moſt faire occaſion vntread damned flight like bated retired flood leauing rankneſſe irregular courſe stoope lowe within thoſe bounds haue ore-look'd calmely run obedience euen ocean great king iohn arme giue helpe beare hence cruell pangs death right meloone engliſh lords perſwaſion againe falne haue wiſh'd long caſt away goodwin dol ah fowle newes beſhrew hart thinke night hath made king iohn flie houre two night part wearie powres meſ euer true acquaint euill might better arme time leiſure knowne baſt take taſte hub monke tell reſolued villaine whoſe bowels burſt king yet peraduenture may recouer baſt didſt leaue tend maieſty hub know lords blood touch'd corruptibly pure braine fraile dwelling houſe doth idle comments makes fore-tell ending mortality enter pembroke pem highneſſe yet doth holds beleefe brought open ayre would allay
